Product Description:
Thule Elite G2 Bike Rack for Caravans and Motorhomes

Please note: we cannot accept returns on bike racks. Please ensure this item is compatible with your vehicle before purchasing.

One of the most popular bike racks Thule have to offer, the G2 Elite is available in two variations as both short and standard, depending on the existing fixing points on your motorhome.
The Thule G2 Elite bike rack comes as standard suitable to fit 2 bikes, with optional extra accessories allowing you to carry up to 4 bikes and boasts a maximum weight capacity of up to 60kg, ideal for E-bikes.
With easy to use adjustable rails and wheel holders you can take almost any bike away with you.

The Thule Elite G2 Bike-Rack is available in two different sizes and is compatible with Motorhomes and Caravans.

Product Name: Vitrifrigo TL20 Top Loading Campervan Fridge
Product Description:
Vitrifrigo TL20 Top Loading Campervan Fridge

The Vitrifrigo TL20 

Is an ideal top loading fridge for your Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome or Boat, due to lending itself to work surfaces with limited depth.

Ideal for smaller van conversions

With an overall depth of just 248mm, the Vitrifrigo TL20 top loading fridge is the optimal use of space in conversions such as the VW CADDY or the Toyota Granvia, the Citroen Bongo, and other conversions on a smaller chassis where depth is an issue.

Cut down that weight and noise

The Vitrifrigo TL20 uses the BD Micro, which is super quiet and 45% lighter than the standard BD35 compressor, cutting down on the weight for your smaller campervan conversion or teardrop caravan, to a meagre 15kg

Lowest power consumption

The Vitrifrigo TL20 has the lowest power consumption of any of the range of toploading fridges, using on average, a very modest 0.2ah per hour in British summertime.

Capacity and usage

The new Vitrifrigo TL20 campervan fridge has a decent 20 litre capacity, in a top opening fridge that is only 230mm deep.

The internal height of 325mm allows you to stand standard wine bottles to upright.

Easy to install

Installation into your campervan is straight forward with the compressor mounted below the fridge.

The thermostat is separate and can be mounted up to 0.8m from the fridge to maximise the usable space inside the fridge, and your campervan

  • Dimensions (mm)  578 H   408 W  228 D
  • Capacity (litres) 20
  • Power (Voltage) 12/24
  • Weight Kg 17

Product Name: Dometic Fridge Black Ventilation Kit LS100 LS200
Product Description:
Dometic LS100 & LS200 Black Fridge Vent Kits for Caravans and Motorhomes

Sufficient ventilation is essential for your absorption fridge to operate correctly.

Avoid the energy wasting heat build-up that can occur behind your caravan or motorhome fridge with the Dometic Fridge Ventilation Kits LS100 (Upper) & LS200 (Lower) which provide two different modules of efficient ventilation.

These grilles are black in colour to complement dark coloured appliances and decor in your caravan or motorhome.

Enhanced cooling performance

The upper ventilation grille of the LS100 Caravan Fridge Vent System allows heated air to easily escape via the ventilation grille, whilst the LS200 lower ventilation system permits cool air from the outside to access the rear of the fridge. Both the LS100 and LS200 Caravan Fridge Vent kits save vital energy and help to support the cooling performance.

Easy maintenance

The LS100 and LS200 Caravan Fridge Ventilation grilles are suitable for all single-door absorption fridges and are designed for easy maintenance without needing to remove the fridge.

Please note: Only the correct installation of both ventilation grilles ensures for the optimum performance of your caravan fridge.

White fridge vent kits are available here

Product Description:
Reimo Silver Lipped Knock-On T-Bar Edging

Edging profile for finishing 15mm furniture board.

Simple to apply

Easy to knock into boards once a groove has been machined that is 0.5mm less in width than the edging profile barb, as illustrated below.

Just tap into the groove with a rubber mallet to avoid impact marks. It can also be attached with hot glue if hot glue is added into the groove first.

Features

The edging trim is 15mm wide for covering the cut edges of lightweight ply furniture boards.

Ideal for personalising your furniture.

Product Name: Double Lipped Knock-On Edging T Trim in Silver for 15mm Campervan Ply
Product Description:
T Trim knock on edging for 15mm furniture board

Double lipped knock-on trim for campervan conversions - silver

Double lipped edging trim to finish the cut edges of 15mm lightweight ply furniture board. Ideal for the edges of table tops and counters in campervans.

Easy to Install

No glue needed, requires a 1.8 slot cutter to make a groove into which the T barb is gently knocked in using a rubber mallet.
Sold in 5, 10 or 50 metre lengths from the roll.

Product Name: Inlander Montpellier Retro 12v Under Counter Fridge
Option Set: Inlander Retro Fridge Freezer Colour Options
Product Description:
Inlander Montpellier Retro 12v Under Counter Fridge 

Style and Practicality

Tired of samey looking fridges onboard your Narrowboat on in your shepherds hut or static caravan?

Maybe a step back in time would lift the look, with these retro styled, low power consumption under counter 12v fridges from Montpellier Inlander.

Replace your old Electrolux fridge

The dimensions of H835 x W 486 X D536 of the JLS99DWB mean, that providing you can squeeze another 10mm on the height of your old Dometic or Electrolux fridges, the Inlander Retro can replace models stated below, with a stylish, low power consuming retro styled compressor fridge, in a choice of colours to style up your Narrow boat, Static Caravan, Shepherds hut, or wherever a low voltage fridge is required

Technical Information

  • Power consumption (Avg 24hr) 2.26 AH (amp hours)
  • Includes Evaporator Plate For Excess Moisture
  • Overall Capacity: 86 Litres
  • 60 Litre fridge capacity
  • 26 Litre Freezer capacity
  • Dimensions (mm): H 835 x W 486 x D 536
  • Internal Dimensions freezer H180 x W410 x D400 
  • Internal dimensions fridge   H 470 x w 410 x d 440
  • Compressor type: Danfoss BD35
  • Not compatible with 24v supply or MPS35 adapter
  • Note: there is no shelf on freezer door
  • Note: the door cannot be swapped from right to left
  • Campervan Caravan or Motorhome users, please note - there is no secured door catch (a requirement when in transit)

The Inlander Retro is a suitable compressor fridge replacement for the older 3 way models such as:

Dometic RM8400, RM8401, RM5380, RM4181, RM4230, RM4231, RM4261, RM4265, RM4270, RM4271, RM4275, RM4285, RM2250, RM2251, RM2253, RM2254, RM2260, RM2266, RM2267, RM2268, RM2280, RM2281, RM2285, RM2290, RM2291, RM2292, RM7360, RM7270, RM7365, RM7371, RM6270, RM6271, RM6275, RM6290, RM6361, RM6365, RM7271 & RM7270.
Product Availability: #Special Order - 3 to 5 working days

Product Name: Inlander JLS407i Under Counter 12v Compressor Fridge
Product Description:
Inlander 407i Under Counter 12v Compressor Fridge 

Overview

The Inlander 407i is an extremely efficient 12v fridge with a 3 star icebox, and dimensions similar to the older 3 way absorption type fridges.

High Capacity

80 litre capacity and a true 3 star freezer compartment. Perfect if you require a larger capacity fridge and freezer anywhere that 12v refrigeration is required*, but still need low power consumption and 12v operation, with optional mains.

Efficient and Practical

With an average current draw of 1.09AH (amps per hour), the Inlander 407i will not be a battery killer when you are running off grid, and away from Mains on your trip.

  • Danfoss BD35 Compressor
  • 80 Litre Capacity
  • Dimensions (mm) H 840 x W 480 x D500
  • Power Consumption @12v (Avg 24hrs) 1.09AH (amps per hour)
  • 3 Star Freezer Compartment
  • Not compatible with 24v supply or MPS35 adapter

Campervan, caravan or motorhome users, please note - there is no secured door catch (a requirement when in transit).

Large Capacity

89 litre capacity, and a freezer compartment. Perfect if you require a larger capacity fridge and freezer onboard your Narrowboat, but still need low power consumption and 12v operation. Shore Power Option Available.

Useful Efficiency

With an average current draw of 1.14 Ahrs per hour, the Inlander 405W 12v Under counter Narrow boat Fridge will not be harsh on battery capacity when you are moored and away from shore power on your Narrowboat

Product Name: G4 / U6 Sensus Domestic LPG Natural Gas Meter 45 Degree Angled Index
Product Description:
G4 / U6 Sensus LPG Natural Gas Meter with 45 Degree Angled Index suitable for Household and Static Caravan

  • U6 G4 Gas Meter
  • Compatible with LPG, natural gas, and town gas
  • Suitable for static caravan and residential use
  • Suitable for recessed and surface mounted installations
  • Fireproof to EN1359 standard
  • Transco and OFGEM Approved
  • 152mm hole centres
  • 1" BS746 male connections
  • 45 degree angled index

Sensus G4 / U6 LPG Natural Town Gas Meter Specification

  • Cyclic volume: 2.0 dm3
  • Rated capacity Q max: 6.0 m3/hr
  • Rated capacity Q min: 0.04 m3/hr
  • Working pressures up to: 0.5 bar
  • Weight: 4 kg
  • Max. index reading: 99999,999 m3
  • Case work: Corrosion resistant coated steel
  • Finish: Powder Coated
  • Fire resistant to: BS4161 (821°C rise in 30 min)
  • Gas: Natural, manufactured or LPG
  • Diaphragms: Synthetic
  • Typical connection size: 1" threaded
  • Outputs: Integral / retrofit
  • Pulse value: 0.01m3
  • Max ratings : 12Vdc 10mA

G4 / U6 LPG and Natural Gas Meter Installation

All gas appliances must be installed by a qualified Gas Safe registered engineer.

Product Name: Thule Awning Bracket Kit for Omnistor 6200/6300 - Renault Master Opel Movano 2011 Onwards
Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 6200/6300 Awning Bracket Kit for Renault Master Opel Movano 2011 Onwards (Previously 308959)

Fixing to the roof of your vehicle allowing you to install your Thule Omnistor 6200 or 6300 Awning

The Thule Omnistore Renault Master awning adapter brackets are a great way to add an awning to your van without having to make any permanent modifications to your campervan.

The Thule Omnistore Renault Master awning fixing brackets brackets are a set of 3 brackets that allow you to mount a Thule Omnistor 6300 or 6200 awning to a Renault Master campervan, manufactured after 2010. The brackets are made of aluminium and are designed to fit the roof of the van without the need for drilling. They also include an EPDM seal to help prevent leaks.

Suggested Awning lengths:

Thule Omnistor 6300 3.25 m > Renault Master L2 (5500 mm)
Thule Omnistor 6300 3.75 m > Renault Master L3 (6000 mm)
Thule Omnistor 6300 4.00 m > Renault Master L4 (6700 mm)

Whats in the Box?

Product Description:
Inlander RIR99DW4 12v Fridge freezer For Narrowboats

The Low Power No Gas Alternative

The Inlander RIR99DW4 is a compressor fridge freezer, with very similar dimensions to the larger 3 way Narrow boat fridge freezers by Dometic and Thetford, but with a very low power consumption figure of just around an average of 2.1AH (amps per hour) (Over 24 hrs)

An Ideal Narrow boat Fridge Freezer

With it's Dimensions of 1225H x 500W x 540D (mm) the RIR99DW4 replaces the older types of 3 way fridge freezers from Thetford and Dometic, being 25mm less wide overall, and spot on height, without the need for external venting, or complicated re-wiring (Please check depth carefully)

Choice Of Colours

The RIR99DW4 12v Fridge Freezer is available in a choice of Black, White or Silver to suit the interior of your Narrow boat, shepherds hut or static, or wherever a low voltage fridge freezer is required *

Specifications

  • Dimensions 1225H x 500W x 540D (mm)
  • Power Consumption 2.1AH (amps per hour) (AVG. Over 24 hrs)
  • Capacity Fridge 93 Litres
  • Capacity Freezer 46 Litres
  • Capacity overall 139 Litres
  • Compressor type Danfoss BD35
  • Not compatible with 24v supply or MPS35 adapter
  • Campervan, caravan or motorhome users, please note - there is no secured door catch (a requirement when in transit)
Product Availability: Discontinued

Product Name: CBE DS305-UK 12v Caravan Campervan Distribution Unit
Product Description:
CBE DS300 12V Power Distribution Unit

Versatile 12V Electrical Management for Campervans, Caravans, and Motorhomes

The CBE DS300 is a 12V power distribution unit, designed to efficiently manage and distribute power in campervans, caravans, and motorhomes. This unit ensures a safe and organized electrical system, making it an essential component for any off grid 12v system in campervans caravans and motorhomes.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Multi-Amp Fuse Protection: Equipped with 3A, 5A, 10A, 20A, 25A, and 30A fuses to accommodate a range of power requirements.
  • Complete Connection Kit: Comes with all necessary connections and pins for easy installation.
  • Safe & Reliable Power Distribution: Ensures stable 12V power delivery to onboard electrical systems.
  • Ideal for Campervans, Caravans, and Motorhomes: Designed to meet the demands of leisure vehicle electrical setups.
  • Compact & Durable Design: Built for longevity in off grid applications.

 Specifications

  • Dimensions 180H x 140W x 85D (mm)
  • Inlcudes: Fuses pins and connections
  • Compatible with: PC100 PC200 Power Mangement System

With its wide range of fuse options and easy installation, the CBE DS300 provides a dependable power management solution, ensuring your 12v electrical system and appliances runs smoothly and safely whilst off grid in campervans, caravans and motorhomes.

Product Name: PC100 Campervan Caravan Power Management System
Product Description:
PC100 Campervan Caravan Power Management System

Overview

The CBE PC100 is a power management system, which is microprocessor controlled and provides charging, 12v, and mains distribution and fused protection in your campervan or caravan.

Complete with LED display, the control panel provides these functions

  • Car battery test
  • Services battery
  • Control of lights
  • Control of water pump
  • Control awning light
  • Paralell Battery Relay
  • Control of fridge
  • Fuses, 3-30 amp
  • Car Battery Recharge Control

The CBE PC100 Campervan Caravan Power Management System includes:

  • PC100 control panel (Dimensions of which are 192 x 78mm)
  • DS300 12v distribution box
  • CB-516 battery charger
  • Screw probes for waste water tank (fresh probe not included)
  • 6mtr Cable for control panel 
  • 50A fuse + fuseholder for batteries (Vehicle and Leisure)

Swan Retro 12v 24v Under counter Fridges

Style and Frugality

The new line of Swan 12v Under counter Fridges are an ideal, power efficient, yet stylish retro styled refrigerator, in a range of fresh looking modern colours to fit in with traditional and contemporary Narrow boat builds, or ideal for Static caravans, Shepherds huts or anywhere 12v refrigeration is a must *

Overview

Height adjustable between 850mm and 871mm with a 90 litre total capacity (13 Litre Freezer, 77 Litre Fridge) 1 Glass shelf, 3 x door shelves and 1 x drawer compartment, featuring metal handle, interior light, and an A+ energy rating. Ideally suited for Narrowboat refrigeration

  • Available in Cream, Blue, Red, Black and Sage
  • Available with Built in Shore Power Option
  • Danfoss 12v 24v Compressors
  • Available in Right hand hinge only
  • Dimensions: Hx871mm (Adjustable to 850mm) Wx50.6cm Dx57.0cm
  • 77 Litre Fridge
  • 13 Litre freezer
  • 1 Glass Shelf 3 Door Shelves 1 Drawer Compartment
  • Low Power Consumption (Avg 1.12 Ahrs per hour in 24 hours) A+ Energy Rating
  • Easy on a Narrowboats Battery bank

Campervan Caravan or Motorhome users, please note; there is no secured door catch (a requirement when in transit)

Product Name: Thule Rain Blocker G2 Side Awning Privacy Panels
Product Description:
Thule Rain Blocker G2 Side Awning Panels

Side privacy panels for Thule awnings - protect against the wind and rain

The Thule Rain Blocker G2 Side Awning Panels are designed to fit either side of your Thule Omnistor Awning. Providing excellent protection against wind and rain thanks to its hard-wearing PVC material. Featuring a window to allow light to pour through, this rain blocker gives you that extra bit of privacy the enjoy the outdoors in peace, sheltered from rain.

These rain blockers are super easy to install, simply slide into then aluminium rafter between awning box and lead rail. No hassle at all! Dismounting isn't even necessary when its stopped raining, simply roll up each side panel and fix to the top of your awning to open up your space. The G2 side blockers are suitable for the 4900, 4200, 5200, 6200, 6300, 8000 and the 9200 range of Thule awnings.

G2 Rain Blocker Key Features:

  • High-quality PVC material
  • Fits a variety of Thule awnings depending on projection length and mounting height
  • Easy installation - simply slide into an aluminium rafter between the awning casing and lead rail
  • Strong ground fixation with included pegs and pins
  • Panels can be rolled up when not needed
  • Rain Blocker G2 panels can be combined with smart connections

Thule Rain Blocker Sides Specifications:

Downloads:

  • Instruction Manual
  • Installation Kit
  • Smart Panels Guide

If you're unsure please contact us before ordering. Any returns that have been order incorrectly are subject to a restocking charge. For more advice please contact us on 0151 334 0222 to answer any queries or concerns.

Thetford Aqua Kem Green Concentrated Twin Pack Septic Waste Tank Chemical for Porta Potti and Portable Toilets
Product Description:
Thetford Aqua Kem Green Septic Waste Tank Chemical - Concentrated Twin Pack for Value! For Porta Potti Toilet


With a new and significantly improved formula and now available in a cost and space saving concentrated format, the Thetford Aqua Kem Green septic waste tank toilet chemical is perfect for environmentally conscious campers. As part of a drive to become more eco-friendly, many caravan and camping sites across Europe now prohibit the use of non septic tank safe toilet chemicals.

Ideal For Thetford Porta Potti or Caravan Cassette Toilets

Suitable for Thetford Porta Potti, campervan, motorhome and caravan cassette toilets, as well as portable camping toilets from other manufacturers, Aqua Kem Green is safe for use on caravan and camping sites with septic tanks where standard toilet waste tank chemicals cannot be!

Concentrated Twin Pack for Added Value!

Not only is Aqua Kem Green by Thetford sold now available in a concentrated form, but we also sell it as a twin pack for added value. A single 750ml bottle is equivalent to a 1.5 litre bottle of standard Aqua Kem Green! Please see the graph below for dosing instructions.

Thetford Aqua Kem Green Concentrated Toilet Chemical Features

  • Safe for use in septic tanks
  • Improved liquefication vs standard Aqua Kem Green
  • Improved reduction of gas build-up vs standard Aqua Kem Green
  • Improved waste tank cleaning vs standard Aqua Kem Green
  • 1 dose lasts up to 4 days
  • Remains liquid up to -20°C
  • 750ml concentrated bottle equivalent to 1.5L standard
  • Smaller bottle, less weight
  • Less plastic, more eco-friendly
Product Availability: The Thetford Aqua Kem Green concentrated waste tank chemical is dispatched on a next working day courier!

Product Name: Dometic S7 Caravan Campervan Windows And Pleated Blinds
Product Description:
Dometic S7P Hinged Windows And Pleated Blinds

Overview

The Dometic S7P hinged windows are a powder coated aluminium framed window, ideal for panel van campervan conversions and as replacements in your motorhome or caravan.

Curved frame explained

Many campervans have side walls which have a slight curve running top to bottom, the Dometic S7 curved frame window matches the curve of your vans walls.

Lightweight yet premium

Specifically designed to reduce weight and to provide excellent insulation, whilst providing a high grade surface finish, the S7P hinged windows from Dometic are practical for use in you campervan motorhome or caravan.

Unique design system

The unique design of the Dometic S7P windows, combined with an optional matching pleated blind system, make the S7P windows a genuine alternative to polyurethane windows in your campervan caravan or motorhome. The optional pleated blinds also incorporate a fly screen for use in the summer!

Dometic S7P Window & Pleated Blind Features:

  • Powder coated profiles for excellent insulation
  • Multi-locking system provides protection from intruders
  • Double dark tinted acrylic glazing
  • Curvature radius of 5000mm
  • For walls 22-43mm thickness
  • Aluminium weight reducing frames
  • Optional pleated blinds made to measure
  • Optional pleated blinds include flyscreen

Each dose of Thetford Aqua Kem Rinse Pink toilet flush additive is 50ml per 15L of water.

Thetford Aqua Kem Rinse Pink Concentrated Toilet Chemical Features

  • Safe for use with septic tanks
  • Smaller bottle, lower weight
  • Less plastic, more eco-friendly
  • Prevents limescale and keeps your toiler shiny
  • Ensures a smoother toilet flush
  • Leaves a fresh smell of lavender with every flush

Product Name: Forcali 6 Litre LPG Water Heater Static Caravan And Catering Vehicle Boiler
Product Description:
Forcali 6 litre LPG Water Heater Static Caravan And Catering Vehicle Boiler

Forcali has established itself as the European leader in the domestic hot water and Static Caravan Market.

Overview

The Forcali range of A Rated instantaneous tankless LPG water heaters are now available in the UK for the Holiday Home, Static Caravan and Shepherd Hut Markets.  The Forcali LPG range of holiday home water heaters operate without a pilot light offering high performance and safety in a neat compact unit.

Food Standards Agency Approved

Ideal for catering vehicles due to the FSA approval and visible temperature monitor.

 

Please note these water heaters are not suitable for RV's (caravans, motor homes etc)

Compatibility with existing Models

This 6Ltr unit will replace a Morco D61, Cointra Optima 5 or Bosch 5L water heater. To fit as a direct replacement simply fit the stand off brackets supplied to bring the Flue in line. Advanced features, bringing safety of no permanent flame, lower gas usage and far higher water temperature.

Can replace the 4 Morco D15 D61B/E Bosch W135.

Features

  • Digital Display
  • Flow and temperature Selector
  • Batteries Included (2x LR20)
  • Extra large copper production heat exchanger
  • 1/2" Connections
  • 90mm Flue Collar
  • Automatic ignition (maximum saving without pilot flame)
  • Operation at low pressure and low flow ( Min 0.2 Bar Max 10 Bar)
  • Fitting kit included ( Water connection flexi hoses with shut off tap, gas connection for 15mm and 10mm )
  • Size 440 x 300 x 135mm

CE and TUV certified and approved

NB: All LPG Water Heaters must be installed by a Gas Safe Registered Engineer for safety and warranty purposes!

If any problems occur during the period of the warranty or during installation, please contact us as soon as possible.

Product Name: Whale Expanse Balanced Flue Gas Water Heater For Motorhomes
Product Description:
Whale Expanse Balanced Flue Gas & Electric Water Heater For Motorhomes

The Whale Expanse is a compact and versatile water storage heater ideal for maximising the available living space inside your campervan and motorhome through internal or external mounting (model specific), without the need to drill through the vehicle side walls.

The Whale Expanse offers 8 litres of water storage with the capacity to produce 14 litres of hot water whilst operating on 240v and LPG gas, with the option to operate on the individual power source or in combination to produce a faster heating time.

Flexible and streamlined installation

The versatile design of the Whale Expanse water heater allows it to be mounted in a variety of locations either internally or under the motorhome or campervan chassis. Secure mounting points are pre-moulded in the outer housing of the Whale Expanse. Also incorporated into the underside of the water heater is a fan-assisted flue minimising the need to make cut outs to your motorhome or campervan, speeding up installation time and ensuring your vehicles structure remains intact.

Additionally, the Whale Expanse includes external gas connections and an integrated Pressure Relief Drain Valve. The Whale Expanse water heater connects easily to Whale Quick Connect plumbing but adaptors can be used allowing it to connect to other typical plumbing systems.

Whale Expanse Water Heater Features:

  •     Fast and highly efficient
  •     12v Ignition
  •     Space saving
  •     Easy to install
  •     The Whale Expanse fits inside the vehicle or externally under floor
  •     Balanced flue
  •     Gas, electric or combined
  •     Complete with switch and wiring

Complete system option:

The Whale Expanse water heater, when fitted alongside a Propex or Whale Under Floor Space Heater can create a high performance complete under floor gas and electric water and space heating system. The Whale Expanse is currently the only one on the market.

Please note: That if replacing an existing Expanse the model number of your heater MUST match the part number shown in the SKU code. For example DW8212UR is NOT compatible with SET WL8212

Manual:

Product Name: Campervan Caravan Motorhome Shower Tray to Suit Thetford C223 C224
Option Set: Thetford C223 C224 Shower Tray Options
Product Description:
Shower Tray compatible with Thetford C223CS & C224CWE Cassette Toilets

This shower tray is a great option for those who want a shower tray that is specifically designed to be used with the Thetford C223CS & C224CWE cassette toilets. It is ideal for compact spaces inside a campervan, caravan, motorhome or boat.

The cut out in the shower tray is specifically designed to fit either the Thetford Cassette C223 or C224 range of toilets. This ensures a snug and secure fit, and prevents any leaks. The shower tray can also be trimmed down if required, for spaces with a tighter fit.

Lightweight Materials

The shower tray is made from lightweight materials and is easy to clean. It has a dimpled surface to reduce the chance of slipping.

If you are looking for a shower tray that is specifically designed for use with Thetford cassette toilets, then this is the perfect option for you. It is compact, easy to install, and can be trimmed down to fit tighter spaces inside a campervan, caravan, motorhome or boat.

Available in Left or Right?

The shower tray side option refers to which side the shower tray is on as you are sat on the toilet.

Thetford compatible shower tray dimensions:

  • L/H Tray measures 1157mm x 697mm (+/- 5mm)
  • R/H tray measures 1070mm x 700mm (+/- 5mm)
  • However both can be trimmed down. Please call our technical helpline for more information.

Please note: Toilets are sold separately - the toilet shown in images above is demonstrative only. The previous design used spots - new design uses grooves as in photos with toilet.

Product Name: Dometic RMD 10.5S Motorhome Caravan 3-way 12v 230v LPG Gas Absorption Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Dometic RMD 10.5S Caravan Motorhome 153L Absorption Fridge Freezer - 3 Way Power LPG Gas 12v 230v

Introducing the new generation Dometic RMD 10.5S 3-way absorption fridge freezer, great for use in your caravan , motorhome or even large campervan conversion! The Dometic RMD 10.5S is 3-way and has the ability to run on LPG gas or 12v DC or 230v AC power sources, and includes automatic power selection.

Best in class cooling performance!

The Dometic RMD 10.5S fridge freezer not only looks amazing, but also has a massive 153 litres of capacity and offers best in class cooling performance. Dometic have even tested the RMD 10.5S in the desert of Australia to ensure the new cooling unit is able to continue to keep contents at a consistent temperature even in extreme heat.

Stylish and innovative, double hinged opening!

Featuring an impressively stylish exterior design and with it's innovative and patented dual hinge system, the door of the Dometic RMD 10.5S can be opened from either side, perfect for the tight spaces found in your motorhome , caravan or campervan. A 2-point locking system in is fitted on hinge of the fridge and freezer for secure transportation and usage.

Simple controls, versatile, and energy saving!

With an easy to understand TFT screen control panel and soft-touch controls, the RMD 10.5T fridge freezer from Dometic is extremely easy to use and control. The Dometic RMD 10.5S is also extremely versatile with a vast array of interior configuration options and is lit by an effective and eco-friendly LED light bar.

Dometic RMD 10.5S Absorption Fridge Freezer Features:

  • Dometic dual hinged door
  • Aluminium door handles
  • Stylish modern design
  • Automatic energy selection
  • 3 way power source - 230v AC, 12v DC, LPG gas
  • Superb cooling performance
  • Regular sized cabinet for maximum compatibility
  • Separate fridge and freezer compartments
  • Two point hinge locking system
  • Customizable door panel
  • Simple soft touch controls and TFT screen
  • LED light bar
  • Versatile interior

User Manual:

Installation Manual:

 

The Dometic RMD 10.5S 12v 230v fridge is a great replacement for the following Thetford & Dometic fridge models:

  • Dometic: RM 4501L / RM 4505L / RM 7501L / RM 7505L / RM 7601L / RM 7605L / RMD 8501 / RMD 8505
  • Thetford: N3145A / N3145E+ / N3150A / N3150E / N4145E+ / N4145A / N4150+ / N1506E / N1456E / N1456A

Please note - the RMD 10.5S may not have exactly the same measurements as your old fridge model - please check your measurements carefully!

Product Name: Eberspacher Airtronic D2L Volkswagen VW T5 T6 Internally Mounted Campervan Diesel Heater
Product Description:
Eberspacher Airtronic D2L internal diesel air space heater
for Volkswagen T5 T6 VW campervan with EasyStart Pro

Supplied with an internal mounting plate, the Eberspacher Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is ideal for use in your Volkswagen T5 or T6 campervan. The Airtronic D2L is powered by diesel and thus extremely convenient for using off-grid and availability of fuel. Because it taps directly into your vehicles fuel tank for its diesel feed, the Airtronic D2L allows you to heat your T5 or T6 campervan without running the engine which means no more defrosting of windows.

Small and fuel efficient!

Both small and fuel efficient with rapid heat-up times, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is ideal for installation and use in your Volkswagen T5 or T6 campervan. The Airtronic D2L includes the new Eberspacher EasyStart Pro control panel allowing easy management of the units function. The EasyStart Pro control panel is also compatible with the Eberspacher EasyStart Web which allows control via internet connected devices, apps for phone and tablet, or even a smartwatch!

Works wherever your campervan can go!

With its ability to work at temperatures as low as -40°C and altitudes as high as 3,000m (~9800ft), Eberspacher have ensured the Airtronic D2L campervan space heater is as flexible as possible and can be used anywhere you go in your T5 or T6.

The Airtronic D2L Volkswagen T5 T6 Internal Mounting Kit!

Eberspacher have designed this kit with everything you need to for installation of your Airtronic D2L inside your Volkswagen VW T5 or T6 meaning you don't have to worry about choosing the correct parts etc.

Airtronic D2L for Volkswagen T5 T6 Kit Contents

The Airtronic D2L is supplied as a full kit with everything you need to install it to you vehicle. This includes:

  • Internal mounting plate (Click here for the externally mounted Volkswagen VW T5 T6 Airtronic Kit)
  • Eberspacher Airtronic D2L 12v heater unit with fuel pump and holder
  • All wiring harness for vehicle with fuse holder
  • Eberspacher EasyStart Pro operation switch
  • Volkswagen T5 T6 standpipe
  • Exhaust with silencer
  • Combustion air inlet pipe
  • Hot air ducting
  • Ancillary hardware
  • All required clips, screws, and clamps
  • Old product no. 29.2112.00.0057
  • New product no. 29.2113.30.0005

 

Downloads:

 

 

Eberspacher Troubleshooting Guide
Product Warranty:
Jacksons Leisure Supplies are an authorised Eberspacher dealer. As such, our Airtronic D2L campervan and motorhome diesel heaters include a 3 year limited parts and labour warranty.

Your Eberspacher Airtronic D2L diesel heater must be installed by a suitably qualified engineer and in compliance with all industry application and safety regulations as well as manufacturer procedures and guidelines.

To maintain your 2nd and 3rd year warranty, your Airtronic D2L must be serviced in accordance with the manufacturers warranty terms and conditions by an accredited Eberspacher service agent.

Product Description:
Thule Omnivent 12v Motorised Motorhome Campervan Caravan Rooflight Vent

The Thule Omnivent provides your Motorhome, Campervan or Caravan is an ideal alternative to an air conditioning unit.

Versatile Variants

With 3 different designs to choose from, either White, Translucent or Transparent the Thule Omnivent 12v Motorised Roof Light offers features such as an LED touch control panel along with a fly screen and darkening roller blind which can be opened and set within 3 phases for ease of use.

Omnivent Aerodynamics

The Thule Omnivent 12v Rooflight is best described simply as a user-friendly system, with a 6-speed motorised fan which allows you to extract and intake air at the push of a button, the outer design of the dome is manufactured from UV-resistant polycarbonate which ensures any rain water is drained away from the opening this is coupled by a waterproof hinge rail.

Installation Kits

The depth of the dome is 78mm.

  • No drilling required for installation

  • Made from impact and weather resistant materials

Product Name: Eberspcher Airtronic D2L Volkswagen VW T5 T6 Externally Mounted Campervan Diesel Heater
Option Set: Eberspacher External Heater for VW T5/T6
Product Description:
Eberspächer D2L Airtronic external diesel space air heater for VW T5 T6 Volkswagen campervan with EasyStart Pro

Complete with an external mounting plate for a Volkswagen T5 or T6 campervan, the Eberspächer Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is a great way to heat your VW. The Airtronic D2L uses diesel fuel which means it is great for using off-grid and can use your diesel fuel tank for its supply. Because the Airtronic D2L feeds direct from your vehicle fuel tank, it means you don't have to run the engine for the heater to work.

Now available with an optional extended wiring loom for the rear battery, suitable for LWB vans.

Extremely fuel efficient!

Being both compact and incredibly efficient in use with rapid heat-up times, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is perfectly suited for use in a Volkswagen T5 or T6 campervan . The Airtronic D2L also comes complete with the new Eberspächer EasyStart Pro control panel which allows easy management of the heater functions. The EasyStart Pro control panel is also compatible with the Eberspächer EasyStart Web system which allows heater control via internet devices as well phone and tablet apps, and even via some smartwatches!

Wherever your campervan goes, your Airtronic will keep you warm!

Able to work at altitudes as high as 3,000m (~9800ft) and temperatures as low as -40°C, Eberspächer have made sure the Airtronic D2L campervan space heater is as versatile as possible and can be relied on almost anywhere you go in your T5 or T6.

The D2L Airtronic Volkswagen T5 T6 External Mounting Kit!

Eberspächer have compiled this kit with all that you need to for the installation of your Airtronic D2L heater outside of your Volkswagen VW T5 or T6 thus removing the complication of choosing the correct parts etc.

Product Name: Victron Blue Smart IP22 12v Leisure Battery Mains 240V Charger
Product Description:
The Victron Blue Smart IP22 Charger: The Smarter Battery Charging Solution

Overview

The Victron Blue Smart IP22 Caravan, Campervan, Motorhome and Marine Battery Charger is a new professional battery charger with built-in Bluetooth. The Victron Blue Smart IP22 Charger is a powerful and user-friendly option for various battery types and applications. Its advanced features, efficiency, and connectivity make it an excellent choice for those seeking optimal battery performance and smart control.

Smart Connectivity & Efficiency

  • Victron Bluetooth Smart: Monitors and adjusts settings remotely using your smartphone or tablet.
  • High Efficiency (94%): Generates less heat, saving on energy and reducing running costs.
  • Low Power Consumption: Uses only 0.5 watts when fully charged, exceeding industry standards.

Adaptive Charging and Customisation

  • 6-Stage Algorithm: Means the Victron Blue Smart IP22 Charger adapts to your leisure battery usage patterns for optimised charging.
  • Programmable Settings: Adjusts absorption, float, storage, and more through the app.
  • Expert Mode: Gains access to advanced charging parameters for fine-tuning.

Storage Mode and Li-ion Compatibility

  • Preserves Batteries: Minimises gassing and corrosion during long storage periods.
  • Li-ion Charging: Supports Li-ion batteries with a dedicated algorithm.
  • Recovery Function: Restores even fully discharged batteries (except Li-ion with internal disconnect).

Additional Features

  • NIGHT and LOW modes: Reduces noise and current output for quiet operation.
  • Overheat Protection: Ensures safe operation even in high temperatures.
  • LED Status Indicators: Provides clear information on charging stages and modes.
  • 40-Cycle History Log: Tracks historical usage data and detailed statistics.

VE.Smart Networking (Optional)

  • Connects Victron Products: Enables wireless communication between the Victron Blue Smart IP22 and other devices.
  • Battery Monitoring and Sensing: Optimises charging with additional sensors.
  • Synchronized Parallel Charging: Combines multiple chargers for increased power and redundancy.

Able to recover "Dead" (Deeply discharged) Batteries

  • Unlike other brands, the Victron Blue Smart IP22 Campervan Battery Charger will attempt to recharge a deeply-discharged battery by trickle charging it with a low current. Normal charging is then resumed as soon as there is sufficient voltage across the Campervan battery terminals.

Additional Information:

  • 4-Stage charge curve
  • Up to three battery out-puts
  • Low level thermal stress
  • 10mm DC terminals
  • 1.5m cord length
  • 0.5 Watt no loads power consumption
  • 1 Output model: BPC122042022
  • 3 Output model:  BPC122043022
  • This Product Does NOT Include charging cables

Product Name: Victron SmartSolar MPPT Leisure Battery Charge Controller
Product Description:
Victron SmartSolar MPPT Leisure Battery Charge Controller

The Victron SmartSolar MPPT Charge Controller utilizes Ultra-Fast Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) to extract every drop of available power from your solar panels, even in fluctuating light conditions. This translates to increased solar energy production compared to traditional PWM controllers. But it doesn't stop there. The SmartSolar MPPT Charge Controller prioritizes the health of your batteries with its intelligent BatteryLife feature. This innovative technology automatically adjusts settings to ensure a full recharge at least once a week, preventing damage caused by shallow discharges and extending battery lifespan. The Victron SmartSolar MPPT Charge Controller is a revolutionary device designed to maximize your solar energy harvest and extend the life of your batteries. Packed with advanced technology, this controller ensures you get the most out of your solar setup, all while protecting your valuable battery bank. Making the SmartSolar the perfect choice for anyone who wants to get the most out of their solar setup.

Simply put, the Victron MPPT charge controller converts the incoming power from the solar panel into the optimum voltage to charge the battery bank. Most solar panels typically produce approx. 17.5v at maxi-mum power, however a 12v battery only needs around 14v to charge it. With a normal 'PWM' solar controller this voltage difference is effectively 'lost' - it just disappears in the charging process. However, with a Victron MPPT Charge Controller, the excess voltage is converted into extra current, which results in more power going into the battery. The Victron MPPT is most effective on hazy/winter days and when the battery charge is low, you reap the benefits when power is needed the most.

Key Features:

  • Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT): Especially effective in the event of a clouded sky when light intensity is subject to change continuously, the ultra-fast Victron MPPT Charge Controller will boost energy harvest by up to 30% compared to any PWM charge controller and 10% compared to a slower MPPT controller. Maximizing solar energy harvest in all light conditions. This technology ensures you extract every bit of available power from your solar panels, especially beneficial in fluctuating sunlight conditions.
  • BatteryLife Management: This feature of the SmartSolar, called BatteryLife, protects your batteries by automatically adjusting settings to achieve a full recharge at least once a week, promoting longer battery life. Victron's BatteryLife safeguards your batteries by preventing them from being stuck in a shallow discharge cycle. If poor weather hinders a full daily recharge, BatteryLife intelligently monitors the battery's state of charge and progressively raises the load disconnect voltage until a full recharge (absorption voltage) is achieved. Afterwards, BatteryLife adjusts the disconnect voltage to maintain roughly weekly full recharges, maximizing battery health. The Victron SmartSolar MPPT Charge Controller also features weatherproof resin-encapsulated electronics and the option for traditional load control with a fixed disconnect voltage. For additional versatility, the load output is short-circuit proof and compatible with capacitive loads like inverters.
  • Built-in Bluetooth Communication: Monitor and control your system remotely using the VictronConnect app on your smartphone or other Bluetooth-enabled device.
  • Flexible Charge Algorithm: The SmartSolar controller offers a fully programmable charging algorithm for customization or you can choose from eight pre-programmed options for optimal charging based on your battery type to perfectly suit your charging needs.
  • Load Output Control: Prevent excessive battery drain by configuring the voltage for non-critical load disconnect.
  • Protections: The SmartSolar controller features additional protections which safeguards your system with features like over-temperature protection, low voltage battery protection, and reverse polarity protection for both batteries and panels.

Product Name: Victron Blue Smart IP22 24v Leisure Battery Mains 240V Charger
Product Description:
Victron Blue Smart IP22 24v Leisure Battery Charger

Blue Smart Energy IP22 Charger

The Victron Blue Smart IP22 Caravan, Campervan, Motorhome and Marine Battery Charger is manufactured with bluetooth functionality built in.

The Victron Energy IP22 Battery Charger can be used on a range of vehicles including classic cars and motorbikes.

Victron Blue Smart IP22 Features:

  • 1.5m length cord
  • This Product Does NOT Include charging cables
  • Efficiency of 93%
  • Four stage curve charge
  • Available with 3 battery out puts
  • 10mm DC terminal
  • Power load consumption 0.5W

Smart Charging Technology

Giving your battery the exact power that it needs due to its seven-stage algorithm and therefore getting the best out of your battery maintain health, charger and longer life.

Recover Deeply Discharged Batteries

By force-feeding voltage with a low current, the Victron IP22 Charger will attempt to re-charge a "dead" battery, once this has been achieved and there is a sufficient amount of voltage across the battery a normal rate of charge will be resumed.

Remote Status Checks

The Victron Blue Smart IP22 Battery Charger has built-in Bluetooth functionality, meaning that the status of the charger and the battery can be checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop.

All settings of the charger can be configured with the VictronConnect app.

Product Description:
Victron Energy BMV-700 Blue Power Battery Monitor

BMV-700 Overview

The BMV-700 is Victron Energy's most high precision and newest battery monitor. Using the BMV-700 you will be able to calculate and monitor ampere hours that are consumed as well as the state of a charge battery, this is done by calculating the current flow in or out of a battery.

Battery Monitor "Fuel Gauge" and more features

The remaining capacity in your campervan battery depends on Amps consumed, discharge current, temperature and age of the battery. The complex software algorithms of the BMV-700 battery monitor take these factors into account to give a "Time remaining" figure

Remote Battery Status Checks

The Victron Blue Power Battery Monitor has built-in Bluetooth functionality, meaning that the status of the charger and the battery can be checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop. Just download the smartphone app (Bluetooth Smart Dongle needed)

Get the BMV-700 app

Controll all settings of the Victron BMV-700 Battery Monitor via the VictronConnect app - Please note you will need to purchase the VE.Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle

Product Name: Sterling 12v 30 Amp Campervan Motorhome Battery to Battery B2B Charger
Product Description:
Sterling 12v 30 Amp Campervan Motorhome Battery to Battery Charger

What Is a Battery to Battery Charger?

DC Battery To Battery chargers allow you to charge an auxiliary / leisure battery from your alternator whilst driving. They are installed in line between the positive terminals of your campervan or motorhome leisure, and vehicle batteries, (one of which is connected to an alternator, typically the campervan starter battery) and they offer many benefits when compared with traditional split charge systems in campervans and motorhomes, that utilise a Voltage Sensitive Relay (VSR) or heavy duty alternator-triggered relay.

Why do I need one in my Campervan?

Without power, your time wild camping in your campervan or motorhome, can be less leisure, and more displeasure. Direct alternator, or split chargers used in a traditional voltage sensitive relay system (VSR) will only achieve around an 80% charge state of the campervan batteries. VSRs simply allow charge to pass directly from the alternator to the campervan leisure battery but, Battery to Battery chargers take the alternator output and boost or reduce it accordingly, to provide a stable voltage output according to a multi-stage charging profile.

This provides a 100% recharge for your Campervan or Motorhome leisure batteries in a controlled way and typically achieves it up to 5x faster than with direct alternator (VSR) charging.

I have a "Smart Alternator" on my Campervan or Motorhome, is this the solution?

In a word, YES. The use of a Battery to Battery charger is the only reliable solution if you intend to recharge a second (Leisure) battery in a modern Motorhome or Campervan that has an ECU controlled or 'smart' alternator (generally Euro 5/6 compliant engines onward).

These have a highly variable voltage output that is often too low to provide a charge or (in the case of regenerative braking systems) so high that it can damage some battery types.

Due to this highly variable voltage Split Charge Relays or Voltage Sensitive Relays (VSRs) are not suitable for use with 'smart' alternators.

Features

  • Suitable for all battery types (Open and sealed wet lead acid, AGM, Calcium)
  • No connection to alternator required 
  • No adverse effect on ECU
  • EURO 5/6 Compatible
  • Up to 5x faster charging than traditional split charge systems
  • Multi-stage profile for a deep charge and long battery life
  • 9 preset battery chemistry options to suit all battery types, plus user configured profile
  • No ignition feed required in 99% of installations
  • Input voltage boost/reduction for stable and correct charging profile
  • Quick and simple to install (Batt IN, Batt OUT and NEG/GND) cables not included

Product Name: Sterling 12V 60 Amp or 120 Amp Waterproof Caravan Trailer Battery To Battery B2B Charger
Option Set: BBW Battery to Battery Waterproof Charger
Product Description:
Sterling Waterproof Caravan Trailer Battery To Battery Charger 60A 120A

What Is a Battery to Batter Charger?

DC Battery To Battery chargers allow you to charge a Caravan or Trailer leisure battery from your towing socket whilst driving.

Overview

The Sterling 60A or 120A Battery To Battery charger provides fast charging of your Caravan or trailer battery via your vehicle's towing socket.

It takes the low voltage at the towing socket and boosts it to provide the correct, multi stage charging profile for your leisure battery.

The 60A or 120A  Battery to Battery Charger is particularly suited to those who prefer touring, and so don't have frequent access to campsites with mains hook-up, and or those with vehicles whose engines are Euro 5/6 spec. With the 60A or 120A Battery to Battery Charger fitted you can be confident that your caravan battery will be charged at the end of your journey.

So why not a split charge relay instead?

The usual method of charging your Caravan Battery directly from the alternator via the towing socket, offers very poor performance because of the small cable and long run lengths used.

This results in large voltage drops meaning zero to little charging of the Caravan battery takes place and often the on-board fridge simply can't operate at the low voltage provided.

Electrical demands have increased in modern caravans (caravan movers etc.) meaning that good charging has become even more important, however, with the introduction of Euro 5/6 engine vehicles with 'smart' alternators, the charging performance has, in fact, become even worse.

This is because these alternators reduce their output voltage to save fuel when the starter battery is nearly full, which amplifies the already poor situation with voltage drop and effectively renders the charging system completely redundant, The Sterling Battery to Battery Chargers are a far more efficient option.

Features

  • Suitable for all battery types (wet lead acid open and sealed, AGM, gel, lithium and calcium)
  • No connection to alternator required
  • No adverse effect on ECU
  • EURO 5/6 Compatible
  • Up to 5x faster charging than traditional split charge systems
  • Multi-stage profile for a deep charge and long battery life
  • 9 preset battery chemistry options to suit all battery types, plus user configured profile
  • No ignition feed required in 99% of installations
  • Input voltage boost/reduction for stable and correct charging profile
  • Quick and simple to install (Batt IN, Batt OUT and NEG/GND) cables not included
  • Night time setting for silent running (no fan) at 50% power

Specifications

  • Input nominal system voltage: 12V DC
  • Output nominal system voltage: 12V DC
  • Expected output current: Typically 15-19A (dependent on cable size and quality of connections)
  • Voltage output: Variable dependent on selected charging profile
  • Stand-by current draw: 1mA
  • Cable connection: Screw clamp terminals
  • Weight: 1kg
  • Dimensions: 185(H) x 121 (W) x 67 (D) mm
  • Fixing hole diameter: 4.5mm

Product Name: Sterling Remote Control For Non-Waterproof Campervan Motorhome Battery to Battery B2B Chargers
Product Description:
Remote Control For Sterling Non-Waterproof Campervan Motorhome Battery to Battery Chargers

Overview

Sterling Remote Controller for the Sterling BB range of Battery to Battery Chargers for Campervan or Motorhome.

Compact Convenience

This compact remote control lets you access various functions of the Sterling Battery to Battery chargers to be operated from a convenient location in your Motorhome or Campervan (For Caravan and Trailer Model Click HERE) and provides visual information about the Campervan battery, and charger status via the front panel display.

Installation to the Motorhome is simple, requiring just a single panel hole to mount the remote control and one cable connection to the Battery to Battery charger that carries both power and data.

Features

  • Turn Campervan Motorhome charger off
  • Set charger to Night Mode
  • Set charger to float charge mode
  • Display showing charging stage, voltage, warnings and temperature
  • Set charger to float charge mode

Specifications

  • Remote control face diameter: 68mm
  • Depth of unit: 48mm
  • Cable length (approx): 7m
  • Campervan and Motorhome Model
  • NOTE: This remote control will only work with the newer Battery to Battery chargers with the white and red cases.  It will not work with the older chargers that have black and red cases. Cannot be used with the 'Wildside' caravan charger.

Product Description:

The 2 cylinder manual non-OPSO gas changeover regulator kit for allows for two LPG gas bottles to be connected together in your static caravan and you can then quickly and easily changeover the bottle as and when you require.

With a regulator suitable for up to 4Kg/hr capacity, and a maximum inlet pressure of 16bar, with a max outlet pressure of 37mbar, the static caravan manual changeover kit does not feature OPSO (over pressure shut off).

The static caravan manual propane gas changeover regulator kit is certified to BS EN13786 and features an emergency gas shut off instruction plaque.

2 Cylinder Static Caravan Manual Gas Changeover Kit

  • Manual LPG gas changeover head (non-OPSO)
  • Bracket and screws
  • 4Kg/hr regulator
  • 2x Pol W20 pigtails
  • 3/8 male and 1/2 female ball valve with test point

9222 Complete Campervan Conversion Kit

The Dometic SMEV 9222 combination 2 burner gas hob and sink is the ideal solution to your cooking and wash up needs in your Campervan, Caravan or Motorhome.

The 9222 GAZ installation kit comes with all you need to install your Campervan GAZ bottles such as the GAZ 907 or GAZ 904 cylinders

The SMEV 9222 GAZ installation kit from Campervan Caravan or Motorhome consists of:

Specifications

  • Stainless steel construction with 2 x glass lids

Product Name: Victron Blue Power Phoenix 12V or 24V Pure Sinewave Inverter VE.Direct
Product Description:
Victron Energy Phoenix Inverter with VE.Direct

Allows you to power domestic equipment using leisure or automotive batteries.

Reliable and Efficient

The Victron Phoenix Inverter is short circuit proof and provides protection against overheating even if there is a high ambient temperature or an overload occurs, while having a full bridge plus toroidal transformer.

Economic Functionality

With the possibility of an Eco mode the Victron Phoenix Inverter will automatically switch to standby if the load decreases and gets lower than the pre-set value of 15w. Once the inverter is within standby mode the inverter will then switch on for a short time if the load then increases above the pre-set level and it will stay on.

Remote Monitoring

The Victron Energy Phoenix Inverter VE.Direct is compatible with the Victron Bluetooth Dongle, and once this is fitted it can be controlled and checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop.

All settings of the Phoenix Inverter can be configured with the VictronConnect app.

Part Nos: PIN122510400, PIN123750400, PIN121501400, PIN121800400, PIN122121400, PIN243750400, PIN241800400, PIN125010400

The Victron Energy Phoenix Pure Sinewave Inverter is a fully configurable system which can be linked to multiple devices

 

User Manual:

Product Name: Victron Energy Cyrix CT Intelligent Leisure Battery Combiner
Product Description:
Victron Cyrix CT Intelligent Leisure Battery Combiner

Overview

The Victron Cyrix CT Leisure Battery Combiner is a voltage sensing split charge relay and an ideal way to keep your campervan, motorhome leisure and starter battery charged.

Intelligent Battery Combiner and Monitoring

The Victron Cyrix CT Battery Combiner can also be named a voltage-controlled relay or even a split charge relay is designed to disconnect from a battery if there is a short but high amperage load. Doing much more than just connecting and disconnecting a battery based on the voltage to the battery the Cyrix CT uses software that also looks at the general trend of the leisure battery's voltage.

How Does It Work

The Victron Cyrix CT Battery Combiner senses the voltage of both leisure and starter batteries in the Campervan, and prioritises the starter battery, but when the cut in voltage is reached, the Cyrix CT then engages the second and or leisure battery in the Motorhome or Campervan.

This split charge voltage sensing relay features voltage trending software to overcome short-term fluctuations in voltage levels between your campervan motorhome leisure batteries, and prevent unwanted disconnection.

Features:

  • 12v or 24v operation
  • Voltage trending software
  • Dual sensing
  • Over-current protection
  • Over-temperature protection
  • Emergency start assist
  • Virtually zero voltage drop
  • No alternator connection required
  • Model no. CYR010230010R, CYR010120011R

Product Name: Victron Energy Blue Power Leisure Battery Balancer
Product Description:
Victron Energy Blue Power Leisure Battery Balancer

Equalizing the state and charge of two series connected batteries

Overview

If one leisure battery in a series of batteries has a higher internal leakage current then this can cause that battery or others within the series to become undercharged. All batteries within a series should have the same initial rate of charge any large differences will mean that damage to the batteries will occur due to what is called excessive gassing.

Battery Balancing

By equalizing the state of charge within a series of batteries the Victron energy battery balancer compares the voltage over a series of connected batteries. When a 24v battery reaches a charge voltage of 27.3v the battery balancer will turn on and compare the voltage between all batteries within the series and then begin drawing a current of up to 0.7A from the battery within the series which has the highest voltage.

Product Name: Victron Blue Smart IP65 Waterproof 12v Leisure Battery Mains 240V Charger
Product Description:
Victron Blue Smart IP65 12v Leisure Battery Charger

The New Professional Battery Charger with Built-In Bluetooth

Overview

The Victron IP65 12v Professional Battery Charger is a waterproof battery charger which can be used on a range of devices such as leisure, vehicle or marine batteries. Meaning that you can use the IP65 on anything in your workshop from Motorhomes and Campervans to Classic Cars and even Motorcycles.

Smartly Charged Battery's

Please Note: This Product Does NOT Come with Charging Cables

Using a seven-step charging algorithm the Victron IP65 Blue Smart Charger gets the best out of your battery by giving the battery all the power it needs while maintaining its health which leads to a longer battery life.

"Dead Battery" Recovery

By force-feeding a small amount of charge to a deeply-discharged battery the Blue Smart IP65 Charger will try re-charge the battery back to full power, once a normal amount of charge is within the battery and across the terminals a normal charging process is then resumed.

Which Model Do I Need?

Using this quick selector you will be able to see which model of IP65 you need

  • 20-50Ah Battery needs the 12v/5A, 12v/7A or 24v/5A
  • 30-70Ah Battery needs the 12v/10A or 24v/8A
  • 50-150Ah Battery needs the 12v/15A

Remote Status Checks

The Victron Blue Smart IP65 Battery Charger has built-in Bluetooth functionality, meaning that the status of the charger and the battery can be checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop.  All settings of the charger can be configured with the VictronConnect app.

 

 The IP65 Water Proof Battery Charger is a professional unit which can charge a range of products

Product Name: Victron Energy Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle
Product Description:
Victron Energy VE.Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle - ASS030536011

The Victron Energy VE.Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle allows you to wirelessly monitor your off-grid system from your smartphone or tablet. It connects to Victron products with a VE.Direct port, such as battery monitors, solar charge controllers, and inverters, and transmits data to the VictronConnect app. This gives you easy access to essential information like battery status, solar panel power, and system alerts all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Victron Energy VE.Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle Key Features:

VE.Smart Networking: The Victron Energy VE.Direct Bluetooth Smart Dongle connects with other Victron products for a comprehensive system overview (refer to the VE.Smart Networking manual for details).
Instant Readout: Provides key system data and alerts even without a direct connection, enabling quick diagnostics (requires firmware 2.41 or later on compatible devices).
Universal Compatibility: Works with iOS, Android, and macOS devices.
Easy Status Monitoring: Two status LEDs for Bluetooth connectivity and potential errors keep you informed at a glance.
Simple Setup: Clear PIN code button simplifies pairing with your mobile device.
Monitor Non-Smart Devices Wirelessly: Access real-time data from your Victron BMV, MPPT, or Phoenix Inverter directly on your iOS, Android, or macOS device using the VictronConnect app.

Benefits:

  •     Remote Monitoring: Get real-time insights into your off-grid system performance from anywhere within Bluetooth range.
  •     Improved System Management: Make informed decisions about your energy usage and optimize system operation.
  •     Peace of Mind: Gain instant notifications of system alerts, allowing you to address potential issues promptly.
  •     Simplified Setup: Easy pairing and intuitive app interface facilitate a smooth user experience.

Compatible Victron Products

  • For a full list see the "Compatible Victron Products" section of the VictronConnect manual.
  • The dongle cannot be connected to a GX device or to a GlobalLink device

Product Name: Victron Energy Blue Power Leisure Battery Protect
Product Description:
Victron Energy Blue Power Leisure Battery Protect

Easy to install with a 7-segment LED display

Overview

The Battery Protect from Victron Energy will disconnect your leisure battery from non-essential loads before any potential damage from excessive battery discharging, thus extending the life of your leisure battery.

Battery Protect Delayed Alarm Output

If your leisure battery's voltage is to drop below the pre-set disconnect level for more than 12 seconds the Victron Battery Protect alarm output is activated. The alarm is typically used to activate a buzzer, LED or relay. This is coupled with a delayed load disconnect and re-connect, meaning that after 90 seconds after the alarm has been activated when the leisure battery voltage then increases to the connect threshold within the same time period the load will not be disconnected.

Product Name: Victron Energy LiFePO4 100Ah Smart Lithium Leisure Battery
Product Description:
Victron Energy LiFePO4 100Ah Smart Lithium Leisure Battery

Reliable Off-Grid Power for Your Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome, Boat, and Off-Grid Systems

The Victron Energy LiFePO4 100Ah Smart Lithium Leisure Battery is the ideal solution for powering 12V DC electrical systems in campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and marine setups. With 100Ah of capacity and advanced LiFePO4 chemistry, this battery provides reliable, long-lasting power to meet all your off-grid needs.

Built to last, the Victron Energy 100Ah battery offers superior efficiency and longevity compared to traditional wet lead batteries, with a cycle life of up to 2500 cycles at 80% depth of discharge (DoD). It also features a 12.8V nominal voltage, ensuring consistent performance for your 12V DC systems. Designed for easy integration, the battery is compact and comes with Bluetooth-enabled smart monitoring, allowing you to track voltage, current, and power in real-time through the Victron app.

Victron backs the LiFePO4 100Ah Smart Lithium Battery with a 5-year warranty, giving you peace of mind and reliable off-grid power for years of adventure.

Victron Built-in Battery Monitoring

The Victron Energy LiFePO4 100Ah battery includes essential features like integrated cell balancing for even charging and discharging, basic internal monitoring of voltage and charge state, overcharge protection, and over-discharge protection to prevent damage. These built-in protections ensure reliable performance and longevity, making it an excellent choice for off-grid power needs in campervans, caravans, motorhomes, and boats.

For larger systems or setups with inverters, adding an additional BMS unlocks advanced features like real-time monitoring via app, detailed performance data, and enhanced protection for optimal performance. This is especially important for systems that require higher power or more precise management of energy flow in 12V DC electrical systems.

Product Name: Dometic NRX 50E 12V Compressor Fridge Campervan Marine Refrigerator
Product Description:
Dometic NRX 50E Compressor Caravan Fridge

44L Caravan Compressor-cooled Refrigerator

The Dometic NRX 50E Compressor Fridge is a reliable caravan compressor fridge. This modern, energy-efficient 44 litre refrigerator is the perfect addition to your caravan, campervan, motorhome, or kitchenette. The Dometic NRX 50E features a full width door handle, a premium compressor, and an easy-to-use control panel. The interior of the NRX 50E has been reduce to create more space, now including three shelves in the cabinet, and one bottle holder in the door.

 

The easy to use control panel is flush mounted inside the cabinet, with a nicely integrated LED bar. the NRX 50E features a winter mode with a smart closing mechanism top create a gap between the fridge and door for airing out. Easily access your fridge with the neatly integrated full-width door handle. The premium compressor of the NRX 50E is energy-efficient with 3 operating modes; Eco, Boost, Silent. Allowing you to choose the optimal performance mode to suit your refrigeration needs! With the ability to run on 12v or 24v the NRX 50E compressor fridge from Dometic is ideal for use with a leisure battery.

 

NRX 50E Compressor Fridge Features:

  • Reliable entry-level compressor fridge
  • Reversible door hinge; allow to be fitted left or right as required
  • Energy-efficient variable speed compressor that reduces power consumption
  • Dual function locks can act as vents for your fridge
  • Frameless door with black front panel and full-width handle
  • Standard or flush-mount installation frame available as accessory
  • Beveled rear side for maximal utilisation of space on board

Product Description:
Victron Energy Argo Diode Battery Combiner Blue Power


Suitable for a campervan caravan motorhome or boat , the Blue Power Argo Diode Leisure Battery Combiner from Victron Energy guarantees continuous DC power from two leisure batteries. When the voltage drops on the primary battery, the Argo Diode Battery Combiner sources its power from the secondary battery.

Argo Leisure Battery Combiner featuring Schottky Diodes

The Victron Energy Argo Diode Leisure Battery Combiner features Schottky diodes ensuring the operation of the Argo Diode Battery Combiner is fast and effective. A low current voltage drop is rated approx. 0.3V which converts to output voltage approx. 0.45V.

Product Name: Victron Energy MultiPlus 12V Battery Inverter Charger for Campervan
Product Description:
Victron Energy 12V MultiPlus Battery Inverter Charger

The MultiPlus Invert Charger comes in a range of different power outage (500-3000VA) to suit your needs. The MultiPlus uses a powerful inverter and battery charger to deliver clean AC power through its sine wave inverter. Its adaptive battery charging ensures optimal care for your batteries. The features PowerAssist technology, which optimizes power usage. And, in case of power failure, the MultiPlus can take over within miliseconds, allowing your devices to continue running uninterrupted. 

Victron Energy MultiPlus 12V 500/20 to 1600/70

These Victron Energy MultiPlus models combine a powerful true sine wave inverter, a sophisticated battery charger with adaptive charge technology, and a high-speed AC transfer switch into a single compact unit. This design saves space and simplifies installation by requiring only one set of cables to connect to your battery bank. Ideal for caravans, motorhomes, campervans, boats, and commercial vehicles. 

Key features:

  • True Sine Wave Inverter: Reliable and able to power most commonly used appliances. Delivers high peak power surge capacity, stable voltage, frequency, and clean output. 
  • Multi-Stage Charger: Fully automatic microprocessor-controlled battery management system adapts to various battery types (wet, AGM, GEL, Li-ion). Optimizes charging for extended battery life.
  • Dual Charging Outputs: One full-power output and a second for trickle charging a starter battery.
  • Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS): Inverter automatically takes over within milliseconds during a grid failure or power interruption, ensuring seamless operation of connected devices.
  • Remote Monitoring and Control (Optional): When paired with a GX device (e.g., Cerbo GX), allows local (LAN) or remote (internet) monitoring and control via the free VRM app and VRM portal website. Accessible from phones, tablets, laptops, and PCs.
  • Parallel Operation and Three-Phase Capability (up to 6 units): Scale power output or configure for three-phase operation.
  • PowerAssist: Boosts shore or generator power by supplementing it with battery power during peak usage periods.

Victron Energy MultiPlus 12V 2000/80 & 3000/120

The Victron Energy MultiPlus 12/2000/80 and 12/3000/120 are inverter/chargers with similar features to the 12/500/20 to 12/1600/70 models, but with higher power output capacities. Ideal for larger caravans, motorhomes, boats, and commercial vehicles requiring high-power inverter and charging capabilities.

Key Features:

  • True Sine Wave Inverter: Reliable and able to power most commonly used appliances. Delivers high peak power surge capacity, stable voltage, frequency, and clean output.
  • Multi-Stage Charger: Fully automatic microprocessor-controlled battery management system adapts to various battery types (wet, AGM, GEL, Li-ion). Optimizes charging for extended battery life.
  • Dual Charging Outputs: One full-power output and a second for trickle charging a starter battery.
  • Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS): Inverter automatically takes over within milliseconds during a grid failure or power interruption, ensuring seamless operation of connected devices.
  • Remote Monitoring and Control (Optional): When paired with a GX device (e.g., Cerbo GX), allows local (LAN) or remote (internet) monitoring and control via the free VRM app and VRM portal website. Accessible from phones, tablets, laptops, and PCs.

Unique Features (2000/80 & 3000/120 only):

  • PowerAssist: Intelligently manages AC source limitations and battery power to prevent overloads and provide additional power when needed.
  • Virtually Unlimited Power with Parallel Operation: Up to 6 units can operate in parallel for increased power output. Three-phase or split-phase operation is also possible.

Product Name: Victron Energy BlueSolar MPPT Solar Charge Controller
Option Set: Victron Energy MPPT BlueSolar Charge Controller Model
Product Description:
Victron Energy BlueSolar MPPT Solar Charge Controller


The BlueSolar MPPT solar energy charge controller by Victron Energy is designed to maximise the amount of energy harvested from your PV solar panel installation by utilising MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) technology, as well as using the solar energy generated efficiently to charge your storage batteries in the shortest time.

BlueSolar features BatteryLife technology by Victron Energy

When quick charging a battery using a high charge current, this can potentially damage a battery, as well as create excessive heat which can also damage a battery.

The BlueSolar MPPT solar charge controller uses Victron Energy BatterySafe technology which limits the charging voltage accordingly and features a temperature sensor to ensure heat stays within a safe range, thus preventing damage to your storage battery.

Victron Energy BlueSolar MPPT allows for Remote Control

When paired with a bluetooth dongle, you can use a smartphone or smart device with VictronConnect to control your BlueSolar MPPT solar charge controller. When connected to the internet you can use the Victron Remote Management portal to access your Victron Energy BlueSolar MPPT solar charge controller, allowing you yo control and monitor your BlueSolar MPPT from anywhere at any time.

When there is no internet connection availability, you can use a LoRaWAN device to control your BlueSolar MPPT solar charge controller.

Product Name: Victron Energy Easy Solar 12v Leisure Battery Inverter Mains Charger MPPT Solar Controller
Product Description:
Victron Easy Solar 12v Lesiure Battery Inverter Charger

A Complete Solar Power Solution

Overview

The Victron Energy EasySolar Leisure Battery Inverter Charger combines the capabilities of an MPPT solar charge controller with an inverter and a leisure battery charger while also being easy to install.

AC Distribution

This consists of an RCD and four AC outputs which are then protected by two 10 and 16 Amp circuit breakers. One of the 16 Amp outputs is controlled by the AC input which will only switch on when an AC feed is available.

 Solar Connection

Up to three strings of PV solar panels can be connected to three sets of MC4 PV connectors, allowing the MPPT charge controller and the MultiPlus Compact inverter/charger to share the DC battery cables. Your batteries can then be charged with solar power using a BlueSolar MPPT alternatively this can be done with an AC power (inverter/charger) from the utility grid or a genset.

 

Victron Energy EasySolar Inverter Charger Panel Set Up

Product Name: Victron Energy Phoenix IP21 30 Amp or 50 Amp 12v Adaptive Dual Leisure Battery Mains 240V Charger
Product Description:
Victron Energy Phoenix Adaptive 12V Battery Charger


The Phoenix Charger from Victron Energy is a 4-stage adaptive battery charger. With dual full-rated outputs and a single 4amp rated output, the Victron Energy Phoenix operates in bulk - absorption - float - storage modes.

Intelligent Control from the Phoenix Adaptive Charger

Featuring a microprocessor controlled adaptive battery charger management system that can set up to suit various different types of battery, the Phoenix charger will automatically optimise the charging procedure for the relevant battery and environment in which it is being used.

Victron Energy BatterySafe Mode Prevents Battery Damage

Quick charging of a battery requires a high charge current in combination with a high absorption voltage and creates increased heat, which if not correctly regulated can cause damage to occur to the battery.

The Phoenix Adaptive battery charger benefits from Victron Energy BatterySafe technology which prevents battery damage by automatically limiting the voltage increase once the gassing voltage has been reached. Additionally, a temperature sensor regulates the charge rate to ensure the battery temperature does not exceed operation limits.

Victron Energy Phoenix Adaptive Battery Charger Specs

  • 4 stage charging process: bulk - absorption - float - storage
  • Intelligent microprocessor charger management system
  • Victron Energy BatterySafe technology to pro-long battery life
  • RS-485 data port ready to communicate with a computer
  • 90-265V AC input voltage range
  • 90-400V DC input voltage range
  • 45-65Hz frequency range
  • -20°C to 40°C operating temperature range
  • Battery connection: M6 studs
  • IP21 protection rating
  • H350 x W200 x H108mm
  • Safety: EN 60335-1 EN60335-2-29
  • Emission Immunity: EN55014-1 EN61000-3-2
  • Automotive Directive: EN55014-2 EN61000-3-3
  • Vibration: IEC68-2-6:10-150Hz/1.0G

Product Name: Victron Energy Color Control GX Panel for Batteries & Solar Panels
Product Description:
Victron Energy Color Control GX

The Communication Centre of your Victron Energy Installation

Overview

With a single touch the Victron Energy Color Control GX provides an instant overview of your system including battery state of charge, present power consumption, power harvest from PV and power provision from mains/generator. Offering you live information of all devices connected to it the Color Control GX allows you to have full system control around the globe. Full system control panel for your motorhome, campervan or caravan batteries or solar panels.

Victron Remote Product Management

Also known as VRM - Victron Remote Management is a system that gives you full access to all controls and settings of the full system and their components which are connected to your CCGX allowing you to login remotely from anywhere at anytime providing you with diagnostics and analysis of your products. Remotely monitor your boat or motorhomes electric battery system from anywhere. Conveniently view status of battery and electric mains system in your motorhome, campervan, caravan and boat any time, any place.

24 Hour Energy Storage and Monitoring

Keeping your back-up batteries charged to 100% and using them during power cuts the Color Control GX Energy Storage System diverts and converts any excess solar power to its self-consumption system, thus saving you money.
Product Availability: The Victron Energy Color Control GX Panel is available on a 1-3 working day delivery
