Product Name: Dometic CTLP4110 Cassette Toilet For Campervan Caravan Or Motorhome
Product Description:
Dometic CTLP4110 Cassette Toilet For Campervan Caravan Or Motorhome

Overview

The Dometic CTLP4110 is the new stylish and versatile cassette toilet that will make a perfect addition o your Campervan, Caravan or Motorhome.

The CTLP4110 is a plastic body, like most Campervan Cassette Toilets, but with a Ceramic inlaid bowl, giving it an extra feel of quality.

Versatility

The Dometic CTLP4110 has the same footprint as the recently discontinued and wildly popular C200 series of campervan cassette toilets from Thetford, and therefore can utilise the C200 shower trays, and also the optional service door 3 for removing the cassette through the side of your campervan.

Key Features

The Dometic CTLP4110 does NOT have a swivel seat; however, the seat can be unclipped, and repositioned through 180 degrees.

The CTLP4110 features a ceramic inlaid bowl for better hygiene and appearance in your campervan, or motorhome

Easy access control panel, and high pressure flush with vacuum breaker coupled with the 19 litre waste tank capacity make the Dometic CTLP4110 and ideal choice for your Campervan build.

On board water supply

The Dometic CTLP4110 Campervan toilet has no separate flush tank, and therefore relies on your on board water tank for the flushing.

Specifications

  • Ceramic Inlaid Bowl
  • Powerful High powered Flush
  • 12v Flush Operation
  • 19 Litre Waste Capacity
  • C200 Shower tray compatible
  • Dimensions 382.6mm x 530mm x 592.2mm
  • Removable Cassette with Robust Telescopic Handle
  • Removable Seat can be positioned through 180 degrees
  • Power input at 12v is MAX 0.5 amp with external pump

Product Name: Thetford T2152 12v Slimline Campervan Motorhome Compressor Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Thetford T2152 Campervan Motorhome Compressor Fridge Freezer

Slim, efficient 12v camper fridge freezer

The Thetford T2152 is among the latest of Thetford's 12v compressor campervan, motorhome or caravan fridge freezers. Manufactured with limited physical space and maximum internal capacity in mind, this 150 Litres T2152 camper fridge is a stylish addition to your campervan, motorhome or caravan.

Modern control

The Thetford T2152 uses a capacitive touch screen, making it easy to optimise your camping fridge freezer's performance. The door hinge can also be moved to either side of the fridge, allowing for optimum use of your campervan, caravan or motorhome's space. 

Thetford T2152 12v fridge Features:

  • Powerful 12v Compressor 
  • Night Mode For Quieter Running and Extra Efficiency
  • 152 Litre Capacity Total
  • Net Weight 36.3kg
  • Freezer Volume 17 litres
  • Total Volume 150 Litres
  • Power consumption 0.51 kWh/24h - 0.40 kWh/24h (Night mode)
  • Door type Flat framed 10mm
  • Left Hand Hinged as standard, but easily reversible to right hand
  • Dimensions 1500mm H x 418mm W x 578mm D
  • Warranty 3 Years
  • Freezer shelves are not included with this Thetford fridge freezer

How Long Will My Batteries Last

The 12v power consumption of the Thetford T2152, tested on 2 x 95 amp hour 12v batteries in parallel, can provide up to 4.5 days of usage before requiring charging.

Slimline 

With a mere 418mm of width, the Thetford T2152 Campervan Caravan Fridge Freezer is among the slimmest of the 12v slimline fridge freezers compressor fridge freezers currently available.

Product Name: Thetford K1520 Lightweight Oven and Hob Cooker With Dual Fuel Option
Product Description:
Thetford K1520 Oven, Grill and Hob Cooker

Lightweight campervan cooker with a home-like feel

The choice is yours -  gas or dual fuel electric

The Thetford K1520 comes either as all gas with 4 hob rings, or as a dual fuel stovetop with 3 gas rings combined with a 1000 watt electric hotplate. The hotplate has a diameter of 145 mm, giving you plenty of cooking space and energy flexibility.

Larger grilling area

The new K1520 cooker also has an increased grilling area, providing wall-to-wall grilling space so you can cook for all the family. It includes 12v ignition, a 37-litre oven and sleek brushed nickel knobs.

Lightweight cooker design

The K1520 oven and grill is designed to provide both the best of home cookers combined with the convenience of campervan stovetops. It's especially lightweight, being approximately 10% lighter than similar cookers in the motorhome marketplace. 

Thetford K1520 Oven cooker features:

  • Includes grill pan kit & two oven shelves
  • Gas or dual fuel version available (gas and electric)
  • Brushed nickel control knobs
  • Lightweight design
  • Home-like design
  • Improved performance
  • 12v ignition 

 Watch the video

Please ensure you have correctly measured the oven before purchasing. Re-stock fees can apply if an oven has been opened.

Note: the fan assisted version is special order item, which can take 6 to 10 weeks.

Caravan and motorhome owners please note - all gas appliances must be fitted by a qualified gas engineer. Failure to comply will affect your warranty.

Product Name: PV Logic 150w Motorhome Solar Panel Kit with MPPT Charge Controller
Product Description:
PV Logic 150w Motor Home Solar Panel Kit with MPPT Controller

The perfect solar energy solution for people with high power necessities, the PV Logic 150w Solar Panel Kit provides maximum power from the smallest possible module size making it ideal for boats, motor homes and caravans with space or weight restrictions.

The PV Logic 150w Solar Panel Kit is a tough, durable and efficient energy solution suitable for powering an assortment of consumption devices with the added reliability of being suitable for outdoor use as well as water resistant.

15 amp MPPT Charge Controller included

The PV Logic 150w Solar Panel Kit also comes supplied with a 15amp MPPT (Maximum power point tracking) Charge Controller which increases panel efficiency, protects the battery from being overcharged and also prevents reverse current drain.

What is an MPPT Controller?

An MPPT, or maximum power point tracker, is an electronic DC to DC converter that optimises the match between the solar array (PV panels), and the battery bank in your campervan, caravan or motorhome.

To put it simply, they convert a higher voltage DC output from solar panels down to the lower voltage needed to charge batteries.

PV Logic 150w Solar Panel Kit contents

  • 1 x STP150 – 150wp solar panel
  • 1 x 4m Cable
  • 1 x Fuse
  • 1 x In Line Connector
  • 2 x Crocodile Clips
  • 6 x Ring Terminals
  • 1 x Instruction Sheet
  • 1 x Sealant
  • 1 x MPPT Charge controller
  • 4 x Angle mounting Brackets

 Panel Specification:

Mounting brackets FKA08 included. Other styles of fitting kit are available at extra cost.

 

What output can I expect?

 During summer in the UK we expect 4-6 hours of peak power (where the panel is producing close to its maximum output). During the winter in the UK its about 2-3 hours. 

E.g. A summers day can produce 150w per hour for 4-6 hours generating around 600w-900w. 

The PV logic 150 watt solar panel kit will, at its nominal out, be producing approximately 9.72 amps per hour (ah) to feed into your Leisure Batteries.

 

PV Logic 150w MPPT Solar Panel Kit features

  • High efficiency crystalline cell for “all weather” charging
  • Perfect for TV operation and for permanent fitting
  • Water resistant, robust construction for outdoor use.
Product Warranty: 20 year cell warranty and 10 year module warranty (Cell performance warranty states that at 20 years the cell output will be no less than 80% of new performance values  i.e the cell degradation rate will be no greater than 20% in 20 years)

MENSA Switched 12v LED Spot lamp with Dimmer and 2x USB 

Overview

The MENSA Dimmable 12v Spotlight with USB is a perfect spot lamp for your campervan, caravan or motorhome.  Built onboard dimmer dial and 2x USB port with MAX 2.0 amps is included, meaning you can charge your phone, whilst using the lights simultaneously.

Multi uses

The MENSA 12v LED spot lamps are multi use.  Use them as a bright 3w LED reading light, or, as a dimmed mood light, with the added bonus of having 2x USB charge points for your smart phone or tablet.

Maxxair Maxxshade Blind For Maxxfan Roof Lights

The Maxxshade Blind by Maxxair provides a total blackout solution for the Maxxfan roof light, and has an option with LED lights or standard.

Features:

  • Easy installation using existing garnish ring
  • Reflective backing to block light and reflect heat back from the Maxxshade roof light

Product Name: PV Logic SlimEdge Rigid Solar Panel for Motorhome, Campervan and Boat
Option Set: PV Logic SlimEdge Rigid Solar Panel
Product Description:
PV Logic SlimEdge Lightweight Rigid Solar Panel for Campervans, Boats and Motorhomes 100W, 120W, 150W, 200W

Lightweight Leisure Solar Panel with Optional Charge Controller

The PV Logic SlimEdge Rigid Solar Panels are available in a range of unique models, offering different sizes and power specifications. Available models include 100W, 120W, 150W & 200W, each model offers the option to add on a suitable MPPT charge controller for added protection on the battery of your campervan or motorhome. Ultra thin and super lightweight!

Perfect for off-grid setups, these solar ensure your campervan stays charged during your adventures. Prevent battery drain in your campervan, caravan, or boat with these ideal compact rigid solar panels. A tough, durable and efficient energy solution suitable for powering an assortment of electronic devices. What's more, these panels are suitable for outdoor use with added water resistance and weather proofing. Perfect for marine vehicles including your longboat and canal boat!

Upgrade for efficiency!

Boost efficiency in your motorhome solar panel with the PV Logic MPPT Charge Controllers! These smart charge controllers can increase solar efficiency in your SlimEdge solar panel by up to 20%. Unsure which Charge Controller to choose? We've got you covered! For solar panels up to 120W select the 10A controller. Up to 200W, select the 20A or above. For up to 290W, a 30A charge controller will be perfect.

The 10A and 20A (dual battery) PWM charge controllers (Pulse Width Modulation) uses a method of reducing the average power delivered from the solar panel to the battery. Regulating the charging process by rapidly switching the connection between the solar panel and the battery on and off. Reducing the average power and ensuring efficient, safe charging.

MPPT (maximum power point tracker) are electronic DC to DC converters that optimise the match between the solar array (PV panels), and the battery bank in your campervan, caravan or motorhome. Available as 15A MPPT Pro (dual battery) or the 20A and 30A (single battery) MPPT Pro Plus. To put it simply, they convert a higher voltage DC output from solar panels down to the lower voltage needed to charge batteries, dynamically adjusting voltage to match your battery's needs. Ensuring that you experience the most power whatever the weather brings. MPPT controllers come with a free Bluetooth app for monitoring system performance.

SlimEdge Solar Panel Key Features:

  • Ultra thin and super lightweight
  • High efficiency crystalline cell for "all weather" charging
  • Perfect for TV operation and permanent fitting
  • Water resistant, robust construction for outdoor use

Product Name: Victron Energy Blue Power MultiPlus-II 48V Battery Inverter Charger
Product Description:
Victron Energy MultiPlus-II 48 Volt Inverter Charger 230V

The Victron MultiPlus-II 48 combines the advanced functionality of the MultiPlus, and the grid-optimization features of the MultiGrid to create a fantastic all-in-one powerhouse perfect for powering your off-grid and grid-connected systems, making it perfect for yachting & camping. Different from the MultiPlus, the MultiPlus-II 48 has additional functionalities including an external transformer which brings functions such as PowerControl and PowerAssist. The Victron MultiPlus-II 48V comes in a range of models with different output levels to suit your power needs. Models of the MultiPlus-II 48 include; MultiPlus-II 48/3000, MultiPlus-II 48/5000, & MultiPlus-II 48/8000. 

The Victron MultiPlus-II 48 offers a powerful and versatile solution for managing your power in both on-grid and off-grid environments. It combines the advanced functionality of the MultiPlus with the grid-optimization features of the MultiGrid, creating a true all-in-one powerhouse. This means you get a sophisticated battery charger, a high-speed AC transfer switch, and a powerful true sine wave inverter – all housed in a single, compact unit.

There are many advantages to purchasing the MultiPlus-II, because of its intelligent inverter and battery charging capabilities, advanced features like PowerAssist, and the option for remote monitoring and control all from you phone. Find out more about the key features of the MultiPlus-II below!

Key Features:

  • PowerAssist: The MultiPlus-II will prevent overload of limited AC sources (generators, shore power) by managing your power in two stages. First, it prioritizes supplying your essential appliances by automatically reducing battery charging current if the AC source nears its limit. Secondly, if you need a temporary power surge, PowerAssist can tap into your battery bank to supplement the AC input, ensuring your appliances receive the extra boost without overloading the generator.
  • ESS: Energy Storage Systems: The MultiPlus-II 48 is ideal for both off-grid and grid-connected PV systems, the MultiPlus-II serves as the heart of a Victron ESS system. It offers seamless integration with MPPT solar chargers or grid-tie PV inverters, providing flexibility in designing your solar power solution.
  • Uninterrupted AC power (UPS function): The MultiPlus-II 48 provides consistent power continuity with the built-in inverter. In the event of power failure such as grid outage, shore power disconnect, or generator failure, the MultiPlus-II automatically switches on within milliseconds to ensure your connected devices continue operating without interruption. This lightning-fast transition (less than 20 milliseconds) allows your equipment to continue to operate without any disruption.
  • Remote Monitoring & Control: Using the MultiPlus-II 40, you can easily manage your system with remote monitoring and control capabilities. By pairing your MultiPlus-II with a GX device (such as the Cerbo GX), you gain access to a comprehensive suite of features via the free VRM app and VRM portal website. Monitor your system's performance, control settings, and even automate functions like starting a backup generator – all from your smartphone, tablet, laptop, or PC. This remote access ensures you stay informed and in control, no matter your location. (Note: GX device sold separately).

Product Name: Victron Energy BMV-712 Smart Bluetooth Dual Leisure Battery Monitor
Product Description:
Victron Energy BMV-712 Blue Power Dual Leisure Battery Monitor

BMV-712 Overview

The BMV-700 is Victron Energy's most high precision and newest battery monitor. Using the BMV-712 you will be able to calculate and monitor ampere hours that are consumed as well as the state of a charge of two leisure batteries, this is done by calculating the current flow in or out of a battery.

Battery Monitor "Fuel Gauge" and more features

The remaining capacity in your campervan battery depends on Amps consumed, discharge current, temperature and age of the battery. The complex software algorithms of the BMV-700 battery monitor take these factors into account to give a "Time remaining" figure

Remote Battery Status Checks

The Victron Blue Power Battery Monitor has built-in Bluetooth functionality, meaning that the status of the charger and the battery can be checked on a smartphone, tablet or laptop. Just download the smartphone app (Bluetooth Smart Dongle needed)

Get the BMV-712 app

Control all settings of the Victron BMV-712 Battery Monitor via the VictronConnect app.

Part no. BAM030712000R

 

 

The Victron Energy BMV-712 allows you to keep an eye on your caravan motorhome campervan or marine leisure batteries.

Product Name: Victron Energy Galvanic Isolator VDI-16 A For Marine and Boat
Product Description:
Victron Energy Blue Power Galvanic Isolator VDI-16 A

Overview

Consisting of two separate diodes which connect together in an anti-parallel connection the Galvanic Isolator allows a current in two different directions without breaking a threshold voltage.

By installing the Galvanic Isolator directly behind your boats 230v connection you will be ensuring that forward voltage from the isloator is higher than any potential difference between metals. This means that any conduction will not be allowed due to the voltage and any electrolytic current is prevented.

The Blue Connect Plus along with its smart phone app helps you look after your pool from your living room or if you're away. Caring for your pool remotely

Product Description:
Victron Energy Smart Battery Sense: Optimise Your Off-Grid Battery Charging

Victron Energy Smart Battery Sense (wireless battery voltage and temperature sensor)

The Victron Energy Smart Battery Sense is a wireless battery voltage and temperature sensor designed specifically for Victron MPPT Solar Chargers. By providing accurate and direct measurements, it enhances your off-grid system's performance and extends battery life.

Key Features

  • Wireless Connection: Utilises VE.Smart Network (Bluetooth Smart) to communicate with Victron MPPT Solar Chargers, eliminating cumbersome cabling and simplifying installation.
  • Dual Sensing: Measures both battery voltage and temperature, allowing the charger to adjust charging parameters for optimal performance and leisure battery health.
  • Improved Efficiency: Compensates for voltage loss due to cable resistance, ensuring the correct charging voltage reaches the battery.
  • Extended Battery Life: Temperature-compensated charging prevents overcharging and undercharging, major contributors to leisure battery degradation.
  • Effortless Installation: Pre-crimped eyelets facilitate quick and hassle-free connection to your battery bank.
  • Compact Design: Small and lightweight, allowing for flexible mounting in any location.

Benefits

  • Maximised Charging Performance: Accurate voltage and temperature data enables the charger to adapt its settings for optimal charging efficiency.
  • Enhanced Battery Longevity: Temperature-compensated charging protects your batteries from damage, extending their lifespan significantly.
  • Simplified Setup: Wireless connection removes the need for cable runs, streamlining installation and reducing clutter.
  • Convenient Monitoring: Use the VictronConnect app to access real-time data and configure the Smart Battery Sense easily.

Compatibility and Selection

  • Available in 12V, 24V, and 48V versions to match your system's voltage.
  • Ensures seamless compatibility with all Victron MPPT Solar Chargers equipped with VE.Smart Network support.
  • Configure and monitor the Smart Battery Sense effortlessly using the Victron Connect app.
  • Part No: SBS050150200

By incorporating the Victron Energy Smart Battery Sense into your off-grid solar system, you gain valuable insights into your battery's health by wirelessly monitoring leisure battery voltage and temperature while optimising charging efficiency and prolonging the batteries lifespan. The result, better system performance, cost savings, and peace of mind.

Product Name: Dometic Saneo CS Cassette Toilet For Campervan Caravan Or Motorhome
Product Description:
Dometic Saneo CS Cassette Toilet For Campervan Caravan Or Motorhome

Overview

The Dometic Saneo CS Campervan, Caravan & Motorhome Cassette Toilet is the newest addition to Dometic's cassette toilet range with added features such as a ceramic lined bowl with rotational functionality.

Designed with you in mind

The Saneo's body is manufactured from a high-quality plastic however the bowl is lined with ceramic to give it a touch of quality and class. Fitted with convenient features such as a dual close valve ensuring extra safety when the cassette tank has been removed, coupled with a user-friendly touch sensitive display with the built-in impulse flush allowing you to control how much water is used in each flush.

Features:

  • Auto closing lid
  • Ceramic inlay
  • Touch control display
  • Dual close
  • 90-degree flexibility
  • Cap holder
  • Requires separate tank for the flushing water

Product Name: Truma Aventa Compact Caravan and Motorhome Air Conditioning Unit
Product Description:
Truma Aventa Compact Caravan, Motorhome and Campervan Air Conditioning Unit

Compact Version of the Truma Aventa air conditioner - convenient cooling

This roof mounted air conditioning unit has a 3 speed cooling only function, the ideal way to keep your Caravan, campervan or motorhome cool in an efficient way. The Truma Aventa Compact also helps by drying the circulated air to ensure you stay in a pleasant environment. This compact version is lightweight yet powerful, with Truma's engineers opting for an advanced expanded polypropylene housing to save weight. The Aventa Compact delivers a whopping 1700W of cooling power to your caravan.

Compact PLUS Option

Have a larger campervan? Why not upgrade to the Truma Aventa Compact PLUS. The Aventa Compact PLUS outputs an extra 500W of power compared to the Aventa Compact, providing 2200W of cooling power. Delivering a more powerful cooling output in your caravan, suitable for any caravan but larger area recommended.

Versatile cooling

This compact design can fit alongside other rooftop accessories, such as solar panels, rooflights, roofboxes and more. You can also adjust the air outlet openings to direct heating or cooling where you need it most. Compressor noise is also reduced to a minimum thanks to noise suppression techniques used in the design.

iNet Ready

Operate and monitor your Aventa Compact using the iNet system via Bluetooth with the Truma app for unprecedented ease and comfort. Thanks to this functionality, the Aventa Compact can be controlled via a digital Truma CP plus control panel, as well as with your smartphone, when used with an iNet control box.

This product must be installed by an approved installer, failure to do so may affect the warranty on the product.

Truma Aventa Compact & Compact PLUS features:

  • Powerful cooling
  • Lightweight design
  • Low-profile - both inside and outside
  • iNet ready - can be controlled via control panel and app when used with iNet system
  • Adjustable vents

Avtex V219DS 21.5 Smart HD TV with DVD Player for Caravan and Motorhome
Product Description:
Avtex V219DS 21.5” Smart HD TV with DVD Player for Caravan and Motorhome

Endless Entertainment

The Avtex V219DS is a 21.5-inch Full HD Smart TV with integrated DVD player designed for caravans and motorhomes This model offers frameless viewing and a slim profile for compact spaces. It includes a built-in HD satellite decoder, DVB-T/T2 and DVB-S/S2 tuners for terrestrial and satellite reception, and integrated WiFi (2.4 & 5Ghz) and Ethernet connectivity for access to streaming services like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, YouTube, and UK catch-up services via Freeview Play. Features include wireless casting from mobile devices, Bluetooth connectivity and pause/playback functionality. The V219DS has a Full HD LED display (1920x1080 resolution), 3 HDMI ports (including 1 HDMI ARC), optical audio output, 2 USB ports, a headphone socket, and supports DVD and CD playback. It is compatible with 240v AC and 12v/24v DC power.

Wirelessly cast photos, videos, and music from your mobile device directly to your TV. Watch Full HD through your regular aerial or satellite dish without the need for extra equipment.

Avtex V219DS Features:

  • 21.5” Full HD Smart TV with built-in HD satellite decoder
  • Full HD LED Display resolution 1920 x 1080
  • DVB-T & DVB-T2 Digital tuner
  • DVB-S & DVB-S2 Digital HD satellite tuner
  • Built-in WiFi 2.4 & 5Ghz
  • Freeview Play with Backward EPG
  • Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, YouTube, etc
  • All UK catch-up services
  • Bluetooth connectivity
  • Ethernet connected
  • Pause / Playback
  • Ultra compact frameless design
  • Sleek black finish

V219DS 21.5” Smart HD TV Specification:

  • 3x HDMI
  • 2x USB
  • 1x HDMI ARC
  • Optical Audio Output
  • Headphone socket
  • DVD

With its compact outside dimensions, the Dometic RMV 5305 3 way refrigerator is a perfect fit for panel vans and Campervans, Motorhomes and Caravans.  The RMV 5305 (absorption) Campervan fridge can be installed high-up into furniture, leaving enough space to fit a wardrobe underneath.

Product Name: Thule Omnistor 4900 VW T5/T6 Campervan Awning and Bracket Kit
Option Set: Thule Omnistor 4900 T5 T6 Kit & Bracket
Product Description:
Thule Omnistor 4900 Campervan Awning With VW T5/T6 Adapter

Now discontinued, please see Thule Omnistor 4200 Awning and Thule 4200 VW T5-T6 awning bracket kit.

Complete Thule Omnistor 4900 Awning along with brackets to fit any Volkswagen T5/T6 campervan with a raised roof

Overview

This version of the Thule Omnistor 4900 is a complete T5/T6 Kit awning, available in sizes of 2.6m for short wheel base versions and 3.0m for long wheel base versions along with a projection of 2.5m with a fabric finish of mystic grey coupled with an anthracite cassette finish the Thule 4900 Omnistor finishes off your T5 or T6 campervan with a classy and professional look.

Specific Design

Thule have designed this version of the Omnistor 4900 specifically for the VW T5 and T6 campervans that have a raising or pop top roof fitted. The brackets are mounted to the roof using riv-nuts along with a bonding agent. The Omnistor 4900 T5/T6 Kit provides you with everything you need to fit a cassette awning to your VW 

Your Omnistor 4900 Kit Includes:

  • Awning Bracket
  • Omnistor 4900 /Awning - 2.60 m or 3.0m - Anthracite - 31 Mystic Grey
  • Short Crank Handle

Features:

  • Suitable for VW T5/T6 without any rail fitted
  • For vehicles fitted with a raised roof
  • 2.6m or 3.0m length available
  • Quick and easy (blind) installation

 

Thule Omnistor 4900 T5 T6 Kit Cassette Colours

 

Thule Omnistor 4900 Canopy Colour

 

Thule 4900 Canopy Manual

Product Name: Thule Residence G3 Awning Privacy Room for SWB VW T5 T6 Campervan
Product Description:
Thule Residence G3 Awning Privacy Room for VW SWB T5 T6 Campervan

The Thule Residence G3 Privacy Room transforms your Omnistor awning into a living room within the outdoors transforming your canopy into a perfect living space. Available for SWB (2.6m) Omnistor 4900 & 5102 awnings.

Installation

Made from high quality welded PVC the Residence G3 is supplied with clamping profiles which mount to the side panels and the awning fabric to create a roof seal. The side panels simply slide into the clamping profiles with the front panel sliding into the awnings lead rail, Thule have created the Residence with double shaped profiles which means optimal closing is always achieved.

Please Note: This Privacy Room is only available for SWB T5/T6's which have a Omnistor 4900 & 5102 in a 2.6m length.

What's Included?

  • Wind slip
  • Storage Bag
  • Residence G3 panels

Any returns that you have ordered incorrectly are subject to a restocking charge. For advice please call before ordering 0151 334 0222

Product Name: Fiamma F80S Motorhome and Campervan Roof Mounted Awning
Product Description:
Fiamma F80S Motorhome and Campervan Wind Out Awning

The Fiamma F80S Roof Mounted Campervan and Motor home awning canopy is the latest Fiamma wind out awning.

Fiamma's latest F80S Campervan and Motor home awning has been designed with an aluminium casing providing extra strength whilst remaining lightweight and able to follow the contours of modern vehicles giving a neater, sleeker look that’s less obtrusive and more versatile. With a wide range of new features the Fiamma F80S Awning Canopy is supplied with a Triple Guide lead bar allowing multiple accessories to be fitted to the F80S Awning Canopy as well as dual LED predefined housing for the optional extra LED Strip Kit and the option of fitting a Motor Kit at a later date.

The Fiamma F80S Wind Out Awning is provided without brackets though these can be easily bought by choosing the most suitable to your vehicle by making note of the make, model and year the vehicle was produced, it replaces the Fiamma F65s

Fiamma F80S Features:

  • Dual LED Predefined position in lead bar + case: housings for the addition of the optional LED Strip Awning full-length lighting kit (5m adhesive strip) are made inside the case and the lead bar
  • Compact section: case and lead bar are more compact but as strong as ever. The awning has improved aerodynamic performance as a result of having a 20% slimmer cross-section than F65s model
  • Triple Guide: three guides on the lead bar (highlighted in red in the detail) for fitting two front panels and other accessories
  • Secure Lock: the legs can be fixed to the ground or to the wall and the height of the lead bar can be adjusted with a telescopic safe and practical system
  • Aluminium end caps: new design for the aluminium end caps for maximum strength
  • Extra-Strong Arms: wider, reinforced and articulated arms with double steel cable for optimal canopy tensioning
  • Rafter: central tension rafter in aluminium delivered as standard for awnings from 400cm long

 

F80 Awning Awning (A) Canopy (B) Extension (C) Shade Surface Weight
F80S - 290 290cm 278cm 200cm 5.6m² 27.0kg
F80S - 320 320cm 308cm 250cm 7.7m² 29.0kg

F80S - 370 370cm 358cm 250cm 9.0m 32.0kg
F80S - 400* 400cm 388cm 250cm 9.7m 34.0kg
F80S - 425* 425cm 412cm 250cm 10.3m 35.0kg
F80S - 450* 450cm 431cm 250cm 10.8 36.5kg

* 1 Tension Rafter made of anodized aluminium 

Please note brackets are sold separately and are vehicle specific, vehicles with roofracks may require alternative brackets for installation. F80s awnings are only compatible with F65/ F80s adapters and NOT F45s

If the incorrect awning is ordered collection charges and restock fees will apply.

Please note due to the size of this item shipping prices for Northern Ireland, off Shore Islands and Scottish Highlands may incur an additional charge.

Product Name: CBE PC 180 Campervan Power Management System
Product Description:
CBE PC 180 Campervan Power Management System

The CBE PC180

Is the new entry-level control panel by CBE incorporating LED indicators.

New Features

The PC 180 has all the functionality of the LED panels associated with their Campervan Power Management and brings some new features, for example, a twilight sensor that automatically controls the LED brightness according to the ambient light level.

Features:

  • Microprocessor controlled system with LED display
  • Car battery test
  • Service battery
  • Control lights
  • Control water pump
  • Control external light
  • Batteries parallel relay
  • Control fridge 
  • Car battery recharging control


The system includes:

  • PC180 control panel
  • 12v distribution box
  • Protection fuses
  • Switching mode battery charger
  • Screw probes for waste water tank (fresh probe not included)
  • Cables for control panel 6 Metre

Product Description:
Victron Energy VE.Bus Smart Dongle

Monitoring all aspects of your system can be done with the Victron Connect App

The Victron Energy VE.Bus Smart Dongle is a two-in-one device that provides Bluetooth connectivity and voltage and temperature sensing for Victron inverter/chargers and inverters with a VE.Bus port.

Bluetooth Connectivity

The Victron dongle allows you to remotely monitor and control your inverter/charger using the VictronConnect app on your smartphone or tablet. With the Victron app, you can view AC and DC parameters, device status, warnings, or alarms, and even switch the inverter/charger on, off, or to charger-only mode.

Voltage and Temperature Sensing

The Victron Smart Dongle can also be used as a voltage and temperature sensor for your leisure battery, even if it is not connected to an inverter/charger. This information can be helpful for monitoring your leisure battery's health and performance. The Victron VE.Bus Smart Dongle is a great option for those who want a simple and affordable way to monitor and control their Victron inverter/charger system. It is particularly well-suited for use in campervans motorhomes caravans, smaller yachts and boats where space is limited.

Product Name: Victron Energy 12 Volt Deep Cycle AGM Batteries
Product Description:
Victron Energy 12v AGM Deep Cycle Batteries

Reliable Power for Campervans, Caravans and Motorhomes

The Victron Energy 12V AGM Deep Cycle Batteries are designed to provide reliable power for all your leisure needs. Perfect for campervans, caravans and motorhomes, these VRLA (Valve Regulated Lead Acid) are sealed for safety, allowing them to deliver high performance, long lifespan and complete peach of mind whenever you're off-grid. Another benefit of batteries with VRLA technology is that they are leak proof and maintenance free throughout the life of the battery. The safety valves only release gas in the rare event of overcharging or cell failure, ensuring safe and worry-free use inside your campervan.

High Performance AGM Batteries

With AGM (Absorbent Glass Mat) batteries, the electrolyte power is absorbed into a glass-fibre mat in a closer proximity to the active material of the battery, this allows movement of electrical charge more rapidly, allowing faster energy transfer and better efficiency. This makes AGM batteries more suitable for delivering high current power over a shorter period of time compared to Gel batteries. Making AGM batteries ideal for motorhome appliances and on board electronics in your caravan.

Deep Discharge Recovery

These Victron batteries with VRLA, have the ability to re-gain charge, even from a deep or prolonged discharged state. However, repeated and prolonged deep discharging will have a negative effect on the service life of all lead acid batteries including Victron.

Product Name: Victron Energy Digital Multi-Control 200A GX Control Panel
Product Description:
Victron Energy Digital Multi-Control 200A GX Control Panel

Overview

The newly designed Victron Digital Multi Control GX is now manufactured from durable plastic meaning that it is now lighter and has an included function for easy mounting allowing you to mount the panel on its front or side, due to the mounting frame being included you will no longer see the mounting holes that were seen in the previous version.

VE.Bus System - 1 AC Source

By connecting the DMC (Digital Multi Control) to the VE.Bus system the DMC will automatically configure itself to the syetem, meaning nothing needs to be changed in order for the Digital Multi Control to operate unless you would like to limit the maximum operation current, if you need this to be changed then the "Upper shore limit for AC input 1" will need to be changed.

VE.Bus System - 2 AC Sources

There are a number of different ways to run the Digital Multi Control through a VE.Bus system with 2 AC Sources. This can be done with Multi's if the system is configured with the "VE.Bus System Configurator" tool. You can also run along the range of Quattros by simply connecting the DMC to the VE.Bus system and the Digital Multi Control will configure itself automatically.

Product Description:
Victron Energy Monocrystalline Solar Panels: High-Performance Power for Your Needs

Victron BlueSolar & SmartSolar Monocrystalline Solar Panels

The Victron range of monocrystalline solar panels are known for their exceptional performance, durability, and reliability. These solar panels are ideal for various applications, from off-grid homes, caravans, motorhomes campervans and boats.

Key Features

  • High Efficiency: Monocrystalline silicon cells capture more sunlight, resulting in higher power output than polycrystalline panels.
  • Low-Light Performance: Victron Monocrystalline Solar Panels perform well even in cloudy or shaded conditions, maximizing energy generation throughout the day.
  • Temperature Resilience: A low-temperature coefficient ensures consistent performance even in hot climates.
  • Durable Construction: The panels feature a sturdy aluminium frame and high-quality tempered glass for long-lasting protection against tough weather conditions.
  • Multifunctional Junction Box: The sealed and waterproof junction box provides safety and keeps connections simple.
  • Pre-Wired Connectors: Most models come pre-wired with MC4 connectors for easy and secure installation.
  • Extensive Warranty: Victron offers a 25-year warranty on power output and performance, and 5-Year limited warranty on materials and workmanship, demonstrating confidence in their product quality.

Available Models

  • 5 Sizes (12 Volt) 30w, 90w, 115w, 140w, 175w, use the drop down to select.

Benefits

  • Increased energy independence: Generate your own clean electricity and reduce reliance on the grid.
  • Reduced energy costs: Be electricity independent while on your travels.
  • Environmentally friendly: Contribute to a sustainable future by utilizing renewable energy.
  • Reliable power source: Enjoy consistent and dependable power, even in remote locations.
  • Low maintenance: Durable construction and minimal moving parts ensure minimal maintenance requirements.
  • Easy to install in campervans, caravans, motorhomes and off-grid installations

Victron Monocrystalline Solar Panels are a top choice

If you looking for a high performance, reliable, and sustainable off grid power source then look no further than these Victron solar panels. Their efficiency, durability, and warranty make them a great investment for boat owners, off-grid homes, caravans, motorhomes and campervans alike.

Additional information:

  • PV cells feature a black tint
  • Sensitive to light across the solar spectrum
  • High performance bypass diodes to minimize power drop in shade
  • EVA (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate) with triple-layer design to keep high voltages safe

Product Name: IMASS Instant Hot Water Heater for Caravan, Campervan or Motorhome
Product Description:
IMASS Instant Hot Water Heater for Caravan, Campervan or Motorhome.

The IMASS mobile instantaneous water heater for campervan, caravan or motorhome, is the latest innovation and CE approved.

The IMASS guarantees an instant and unlimited supply of hot water in Caravans, Motorhomes, Campervans and Horseboxes, without any preheating.

Comfort that you normally only enjoy at home is now also available in your Campervan or Caravan.

As there is always enough water available, it does not matter how many people want to take a shower or how long they intend to use it.

This water heater can also be used for outdoor showers or for your children's paddling pool, no problem. If you like, you can also wash your caravan or campervan with the hot water from this heater.

Features

  • Water heater with flow-type technique
  • Highly efficient, brushless exhaust blower
  • No corrosion problems or Legionella bacteria
  • Selection of the water temperature (35-60C) via remote control
  • High efficient copper heat exchanger with an efficiency up to 92 %
  • The water heater starts and stops automatically by sensing the water flow
  • Low weight because there is no tank
  • The burner power is continuously adjusted by a modulating valve and aµ-Processor control
  • Up to 60% less gas consumption than regular tank models. Besides, no tank means no loss of heat and during the night, there is absolutely no noise

Technical Details

  • Maximum Burner Output 10Kw
  • Minimum Burner Power 5Kw
  • Gas Consumption at full load 765g/h
  • Gas Pressure 30Mb
  • Type of gas Propane/Butane
  • Digitally Adjustable Water temperature 35-60 Degrees
  • Typical Flow Rate 5lpm
  • Supply Voltage 10.5-15v DC
  • Current Consumption at 12v 0.44 amps per hour
  • Dimensions 320mm x 320mm x 320mm
  • Maximum Water Pressure 5 BAR

Product Name: Sportscraft Seat Swivel Plate for Ford Custom 2014+
Product Description:
Sportscraft Seat Swivel Plate for Ford Custom 2014+

Precision designed bracket plate, allowing your van seats to rotate

This swivel plate fits securely beneath your seat in your van, campervan or motorhome, allowing you to rotate your seats for more versatile or social use. Designed in Germany for the Ford Transit Custom, the Sportscraft seat swivel plate has a central nut and easy grab handle for operation.

Safe and Secure

This swivel plate includes a locking forward position, ensuring you can drive safely without risk of unwanted movement. Sportscraft swivel plates are also some of the only crash tested (TUV certified) swivel plates, ensuing you don't compromise on the safety of your vehicle.

Full comfort

Sportscraft swivel plates still allow you to move your seat forward and backward as you would usually. They provide 360 degrees of rotation, allowing you to relax with your family without taking up extra room.

Other Details

Handbrake lowering required (not supplied)

This plate will raise the seat height by 30mm

Product Name: Forcali 12 Litre LPG Water Heater for Static Caravan & Catering Vehicles Boiler
Product Description:
Forcali 12 Litre LPG Water Heater for Static Caravan & Catering Vehicles

Being the largest in the range of LPG water heaters from Forcali the 12L room sealed boiler with electronic ignition is a state of the art product. As it is room sealed this means the Forcali 12L can be fitted in any location even bathrooms.

Running on low water pressure is possible due to the fact that the forcali has a full electronic ignition with a pilot light. The Forcali runs on 240v however with a maximum power consumption of just 35 watts means that the Forcali 12L can be ran on a 12v system via a small inverter.

Food Standards Agency Approved

FSA approval and visible temperature monitor - Ideal for catering vehicles

Please note these water heaters are not suitable for RV's (caravans, motor homes etc)

 Features:

  • Overheat control
  • Aluminium gas valve
  • Aesthetic finish
  • Low flow operation and pressure
  • Anti-frost device with valve
  • Fitting kit included
  • Propane or Butane (LPG)
  • Thermostatsic control panel
  • Brass water valve
  • De-oxygenated copper heat exchanger
  • Self-diagnosis system

CE and TUV certified and Approved

NB: All LPG Water Heaters must be installed by a Gas Safe Registered Engineer for safety and warranty purposes!

If any problems occur during the period of the warranty or during installation, please contact us as soon as possible.

Product Name: Dometic CRE65 CoolMatic Compressor Motorhome & Campervan Fridge Freezer
Product Description:
Dometic CRE65 CoolMatic Compressor 2 In 1 Motorhome & Caravan Fridge Freezer

This new 57 Litre Compressor 2 In 1 Dometic Fridge with Freezer compartment is perfect for caravans, motorhomes, campervans & marine use.

A versatile compressor fridge with a removable freezer compartment with low energy consumption, can work using solar panels.

What makes the CRE65 Motorhome Fridge Freezer different from the CRE50

The Dometic CRE65 Fridge Freezer has a bevelled edge on the backside so it can fully utilise the most space in a small area, such as caravan or motorhome. This 57 litre capacity CRE65 fridge, and a 7 litre freezer has a completely removable freezer compartment, much like the previous model, this means that you can fully utilise the fridge area if you have no need for the freezer.  This means you can use the CRE65 compressor fridge as a conventional fridge/freezer, or a straight fridge.

Dometic CRE65 Motorhome & Caravan Compressor Fridge Freezer Features:

  • 2 in 1 solution with unique removable freezer compartment: providing fridge or fridge freezer choice.
  • 12/24v operation
  • Power consumption avg. 1.93 ahrs per hour in 24 hours
  • Intelligent electronic control of the compressor speed - up to 25% less energy consumption
  • Fan speed automatically adjusts to the ambient temperature
  • Perfect temperature control due to new design soft touch panel
  • Bright LED light with infrared sensor
  • Door lock wth dual function
  • Stainless steel door

Vango Radiate DLX Grande Heated Reclining Camping Chair

Keep those chilly camping evenings at bay with the Vango Radiate Grande DLX chair, complete with a Graphene heating element. With 4 heat settings, operated via a touch control, this heated chair will make you the envy of the camping field on your next tent camping, motorhome or caravan trip away.

Luxury and comfort

From a robust textured steel frame and premium fabric, this camp chair provides a strong yet luxurious seat without excessive weight. The padded seat and backrest makes for a comfy chair, perfect for relaxing in from day through to evening. Finding the best position is easy with 7 adjustable seating positions and rigid armrests making sitting and standing a breeze.

Warmth at the touch of a button

Connecting the Vango Radiate DLX Grande heated chair to a power source enables four different heat settings, perfect for controlling the warmth of the heating element and is compatible with a wide range of power banks for complete flexibility and portability. A pocket is provided to safely store your portable power bank when in use.

Product Name: GOK Spare Gas Filter with Cartridge - Caravan or Motorhome Spare
Product Description:
Gok Gas Filter with Cartridge

Caramatic ConnectClean gas filtration system

The GOK gas filter effectively protects the gas system from contamination in gas cylinders. Oily particles are carried along with the gas flow as aerosols, depositing themselves in the regulators and blocking them. The gas filter reliably separates out these oily particles, ensuring the gas system and all gas operated appliances have a long service life.

  • The filter cartridge must be checked for residue, such as oil or clear liquids, at regular intervals, but at least every time the cylinder is changed.
  • Filter cartridges should be replaced if there are residues on the filter cartridge or in the filter cup at least every 2 years.

Reliably protects the gas system from oiling

GOK Gas filter

  • Separates out up to 99% of the oily particles.
  • Filter cartridges can be replaced quickly and easily.
  • Suitable for all wall-mounted gas pressure regulation systems and fillable gas cylinders.
  • Comes complete with spanner
  • Part no. 50602-01
  • Must be fitted by qualified technical trained operatives only

Manual:

Luxurious awning featuring Vango's new sentinel signature fabric!

Boasting both great heat retention in winter and being able to remain cool in warmer climates the vango rhone gives you the best of both worlds, using the same footprint at the Galli the Rhone is far better suited to motorhome and campervan owners that like to explore the continent.

Product Name: Truma LPG Bottled Gas Level Checker -  50501-01
Product Description:
Truma Level Check

LPG Bottled Gas Level Monitor

The Truma 50501-01 LPG gas level checking device is used on the exterior of any standard gas cylinder (with a diameter of 200mm to 350 mm) and indicates whether there is gas at the point of measurement. 

Truma Gas Level Check Features:

  • LED display of the filling level.
  • Acoustic signal indicates gas level.
  • Suitable for all standard steel or aluminium gas cylinders LPG.
  • Reliable measurement of gas by means of ultrasonic.
  • Integrated LED torch.
  • Not suitable for tank gas cylinders and gas tanks that can be filled.
  • Genuine Truma part no. 50501-01

Please note the Truma gas level checker is NOT suitable for checking gas levels on Calor 6kg Lite cylinders with the built-in gas level gauge because the magnet inside the Calor 6 kg Lite interferes with the signal emitted by the pen.

Must be fitted by qualified technical trained operatives only
Product Availability: The Truma gas level checker 50500-51 is sent on a next working day carrier
